Nze mmaite nti ompulira buliijo, neye ntumwire ekyo olwʼokugasa abantu abeemereire aanu, kaisi beezye okwikirirya bati wantumire.”
Oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼayeta nʼeigono eryʼamaani ati, “Lazaalo, owuluke!”
Era eyabbaire omufu nago nʼazwayo ngʼengoye gikaali mbiringe oku bigerebye nʼamangaloge, era nga nʼekiwero kikaali kisibe omu maisoge.
OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mumusindibuleku engoye egyo, era mumuleke atambule.”
Nʼolwekyo bangi oku Bayudaaya ababbaire baabire okubona oMalyamu, era ni babona oYesu ekiyakorere, ni bamwikiririryamu.
Neye abamo kwibo ni baaba giri Bafalisaayo, era ni babakobera oYesu ekiyakorere.
Kale abakabona abakulu nʼaBafalisaayo ni batyamisya oLukiiko oLufugi olwʼaBayudaaya, ni beebuulya bati, “Tukole tutya? Omusaiza ngonu ali kukolanga obumanyiciryo bwʼebyewunyo bungi.
Singa owetumuleka ngʼakola ebintu ebyo, abantu bonabona baaba kumwikiririryamu. Era nʼaBalooma baliiza ni bajigirica eYeekaalu yaiswe nʼeigwanga lyaiswe!”
Awo omoiza kwibo, eriina bati Kayaafa, eyabbaire okabona akira obukulu omu mwanka ogwo, nʼatumula ino ati, “Inywe mpaawo kimutegeera oku biri kubbangawo!
Timumaite muti kibagasa omusaiza omoiza okufeererera abantu, okukiraku eigwanga eribbeereri okujigirika?”
Ekyo tiyakitumwire kululwe, wazira nga iye okabona akira obukulu omu mwanka ogwo, yawaire bunaabbi ati oYesu wakufeererera eigwanga lyʼaBayudaaya.
Era nga tiwakufeererera Bayudaaya bonkani, neye nʼabalondemu ba Kibbumba abandi aBatali Bayudaaya abali omu byalo ebindi, okubairya aamo babbe kimo.
Kale okuzwa oku lunaku oolwo abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya ni basala olukwe okwita oYesu.
Nʼolwekyo oYesu nʼalekeraawo okutambulira omu Bayudaaya omu lwatu. Neye nʼazwayo, nʼayaba mu kifo ekiriraine ekitera oku kyalo ekibeeta Efulaimu, nʼabba eeyo nʼabeegibe.

Awo oMukolo ogwʼaBayudaaya ogwʼoKutambukirya owegwabbaire gwatira okutuuka, abantu bangi ni bazwa omu byalo, ni baaba e Yerusaalemi. Baabire kukola mukolo gwabwe ogwʼokwetukulya, ngʼoMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya gukaali okutuuka.
Kale eeyo ni babba omukunoonia oYesu. Era owebabbaire nga beemereire omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu, ni beebuulyangana bati, “Museega mutya? Tiyaizeku oku Mukolo naire?”
Ekyo kyabbaire kityo olwakubba abakabona abakulu nʼaBafalisaayo babbaire balagiire bati singa wabbaawo amanyica oYesu egyali, abakobere kaisi beezye okumukwata.
Owewabbaire nga wabulayo enaku mukaaga, oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya gutuuke, oYesu nʼatuuka oku kyalo kyʼe Bbesaniya. OLazaalo yabbaire mutyami wʼoku kyalo okwo era niiye oyo oYesu oguyazuukizire.
Kale eeyo oYesu ni bamutegekera ekyeigolo, era oMaliza nʼabainula. Era oLazaalo yabbaire moiza kwabo abaliire oku menza nʼoYesu.
Kale awo oMalyamu nʼakwata ecupa

erimu amafuta amakengeize agʼakaloosa, era agʼebbeeyi eino agebeeta naludo. Awo nʼagasuka oku bigere bya Yesu, era nʼabisiimuula nʼenziiri gyʼokumutwegwe. Era enyumba nʼeizula akaloosa akʼamafuta ago.
Neye oYuda oIsikalyoti, era omoiza oku beegi ba Yesu, eyabbaire ayaba okumulyamu olukwe, nʼakoba ababbairewo ati,
“Kale lwaki amafuta ago tibagatundiremu edinaali 300, era empiiya egyo ni bagigabira abadoobi?”
OYuda yatumwire ekyo tirwakubba nti yabbaire alumirwa abadoobi, neye olwakubba yabbaire mwibbi. Era ngʼowekyabbaire kiti niiye eyabbaire omuwanika waabwe, iye yaibbangaku egimo.
Awo oYesu nʼairamu ati, “OMalyamu mumuleke olwakubba kyabbaire kigenderere kiti yabbaire ali nʼokubisa amafuta ago kugakolesya ku lunaku olubalindiikiraku.
Ekyo kityo olwakubba abadoobi ibo baabbanga na inywe buliijo, neye nze tinaabbe na inywe okumala ekiseera ekinene.”
Awo ekiyindi kinene ekyʼaBayudaaya, ni kitegeera kiti oYesu ali e Bbesaniya. Kale ni baabayo, tirwakubona Yesu kyonkani, neye nʼokubona oLazaalo, oYesu oguyazuukizire.
Kale awo abakabona abakulu ni basala amalabuki okwita oLazaalo yena.
Ekyo kyabbaire kityo olwakubba okulwa Lazaalo, aBayudaaya bangi bazwanga oku bakabona abakulu ni baaba egiri oYesu, era ni bamwikiririryamu.
Oku lunaku olwairireku, ekiziima kinene ekyʼabantu ababbaire baabire e Yerusaalemi oku Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya, ni bawulira bati oYesu ali kwabayo.
Awo ni bakwata ensansa egitali nkujuulye, era ni baaba okumwaniriza nga webaceera bati,
“Tuwuuje oMusengwa oKibbumba!
Wʼenkabi oyo iye aiza omu liina lya Musengwa oKibbumba!
Tumuwuuje iye oyo oKabaka wa Isirairi.”
Awo oYesu nʼasuna ompunda omutomuto, nʼatyamaku okutuukirirya eKiwandiike ekiti,
“Inywe abantu bʼe Sayuuni timwatya.
Aale mubone oKabaka waanywe aiza,
ngʼatyaime oku mpunda omutomuto.”
Omu kiseera ekyo abeegibe tibategeire ebintu ebyo, neye oKibbumba oweyamalire okugulumalya oYesu ngʼamuzuukiza, kaisi ni beewukirya ngʼebyo byabbaire bityo ngʼowekiri omu Biwandiike byʼabanaabbi.
Ekiziima kyʼabantu ekyabbairewo ngʼoYesu ayeta oLazaalo okuzwa omu magombe era nʼamuzuukiza, ni beeyongera okukobera abantu abandi ebyabbairewo.
Nʼolwekyo abantu bangi, olwakubba babbaire bawuliire bati yabbaire akolere akamanyiciryo kʼekyewunyo kanu, ni baabayo okumusangaana
Kale aBafalisaayo ni bakobangana bati, “Kimanye kusani nti mpaawo kitwezya okukola. Aale mubone buli muntu amusengererya!”
Atyanu abamo oku Bayonaani babbaire bamo oku bantu abaabire e Yerusaalemi okusinza oKibbumba oku Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya.
Kale aBayonaani abo owebatuukire eeyo ni baaba egiri oFiripo owʼoku kyalo kyʼe Bbesusaida ekyʼomwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya, ni bamusaba bati, “Sebo tutaka okutumulaku nʼoYesu.”
Awo oFiripo nʼayaba nʼakoba Andereya kaisi bonabona ni baaba okukobera oYesu.
Iye oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Ekiseera kituukire oKibbumba okugulumalya oMwana wa Muntu.
Era mbakobera amazima nti onsigo owaatagwa omwitakali era ni bamuliika, asigala denge. Neye owebamuliika amera nʼabala empeke nyingi.
Buli agezyaku okulamya obwomibwe okululwe, yalibufiirwa, neye buli acaawa obwomibwe okulwange ngʼali oku kyalo kunu, yalisuna obwomi obutawaawo.
Era oyo iye ampeererya, ateekwa okubba aikiriirye okugumira nze ebinjaba okubitamu, kaisi oolwo eginaaba eeyo omwigulu yena beezye okumutuucaayo. Kale oBbaabba yaliwa ekitiisya iye oyo ampeererya.”

Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Atyanu omwoyo gwange gweraliikiriire, era timmaite nʼekyokukoba. Nkobe nti, ‘Bbaabba toganya akaseera akagosi ako akʼokugada nʼokufa okuntuukaku?’ Bbe, olwakubba ekyandetere niikyo nze omu kaseera kanu okubita omu kugada!
Aale Bbaabba ogulumalye eriinalyo.” Awo eigono ni lizwa omwigulu erikoba liti, “Naligulumairye era nalirigulumalya tete.”
Ikyo ekiziima kyʼabantu ekyabbaire kyemereire awo owebawuliire, abamo ni bakoba bati, “Laadu niiyo ebbwatuka!” Abandi ni bakoba bati, “Omalaika atumwire naye.”
Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Eigono eeryo erimuwuliire tiriizire kugasa ninze, wazira kugasa niinywe.
Era atyanu oKibbumba ayaba okusalira ekyalo omusango. Nʼomu kiseera kinu iye oSitaani omufugi wʼekyalo kinu, oKibbumba ayaba okumuwambaku obufugi.
Neye nze owebalinjanika oku musalabba, nalikuusa abantu bonabona ni babba bange.”
Ekyo yakitumwire, ngʼategeeza enfa egiyabbaire ayaba okufaamu.

Awo ekiziima kyʼabantu ni kiceera nga bakoba bati, “Iswe tumaite tuti eBiwandiike bikoba biti oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta wa kubbaawo emirembe nʼemirembe. Olwo tete iwe okoba otya oti oMwana wa Muntu bateekwa okumwanika oku musalabba? Iwe otumula ku Mwana wa Muntu aliina oyo?”

Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mwaba okweyongera okubbaaku nʼekitangaala ekiseera kitono. Kale mutambule nga kikaali kiriwo, ngʼendikiirya ekaali okubazingiza olwakubba atambulira omu ndikiirya tabona e gyayaba.
Kale mwikiririrye omu kitangaala nga kikaali kiriwo, kaisi mwezye okubba bantu bʼekitangaala.” OYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo nʼazwawo era ni yebeebisaku.
Awo oYesu nʼoweyamalire okukola obumanyiciryo bwʼebyewunyo obwo bwonabwona nga babona, era aBayudaaya tibamwikiririryemu.
Ekyo kyabbaire kityo lwʼokutuukirirya kibono kya Isaaya onaabbi, ekiti:
“Musengwa Kibbumba, naani aikiriirye obukwenda bwaiswe
era naani ogubabiikuliire obwezye bwa Musengwa?”
Ekyo niikyo ekyagirire ni bateezya okwikirirya, olwakubba oIsaaya era yakobeire awandi ati:
“OKibbumba yaboofuwairye
era nʼabakakanyalya emyoyo,
kale tibeezya kadi kubona nʼamaiso gaabwe agʼomwoyo,
waire kutegeera,
waire kucuuka ni baira egyendi omu myoyo gyabwe, era ni mbalokola.”
Ebyo oIsaaya yabitumwire olwakubba yaboine ekitiisya kya Yesu, era oIsaaya nʼamutumulaku.
Cooka era omu kiseera ekinyere ekyo bangi oku beekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya bamwikiririryemu. Neye olwʼokutya aBafalisaayo, tibakibbutwire nga baseega bati demba ni bababbinga omwikumbaaniro.
Ekyo kityo olwakubba batakire bantu okubawuuja okukiraku oKibbumba iye okubawuuja.
Awo oYesu nʼalangirira ati, “Omuntu owanjikiririryamu tabba anjikiririryamu ninze zenkani, wazira abba aikiririrya nʼomu Kibbumba eyantumire.
Era omuntu oyo owambonaku, abba ooti aboine Kibbumba eyantumire.
Nze naizire oku kyalo ngʼekitangaala, kaisi buli anjikiririryamu, tiyasigala omu ndikiirya.”
Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Iye omuntu awulira ebibono byange kaisi nʼatabikwata, timmusalira omusango. Ekyo kityo olwakubba tinaizire kusalira bantu misango, wazira kubalokola.
Neye iye oyo angaana era ataikirirya ebibono byange, oKibbumba yalimusingisya omusango oku lunaku lwʼenkomerero ngʼasinzirira ku bibono ebyo ebinatumwire.
Ekyo kityo olwakubba tinabitumulanga kulwange, neye oBbaabba eyantumire niiye eyandagiire ebyokutumula, nʼengeri yʼokubitumulamu.
Era mmaite nti omukugondera ekiragirokye kizweramu omuntu okusuna obwomi obutawaawo. Kale buli ekintumula kibba kinanyerenyeere kidi oBbaabba ekiyankobere okutumula.”

Awo eizo waaku lwabbaire lwabba lunaku lwʼoMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya. Iye oYesu yategeire ati ekiseerakye ekyokuzwa oku kyalo kunu okukanga egiri oIteeye kituukire. Neye ibo abeegibe babbaire baaba okusigala oku kyalo kunu. Era oYesu yabbaire ataka ino abeegibe kale awo nʼabalaga ngʼowabataka omu bwizulye.
Kale omu kiseera oYesu nʼabeegibe ekibabbereire aamo oku kyeigolo, oSitaani yabbaire amalire okuteeka omu mwoyo gwa Yuda oIsikalyoti omutaane wa Simooni ekiseego kyʼokulyamu oYesu olukwe.
Neye iye oYesu yabbaire akimaite kusani ati oIteeye yamuwaire obwezye oku bintu byonabyona. Era yabbaire akimaite ati yazwire giri Kibbumba, era ati yatira okukanga egiri oKibbumba.
Kale awo nʼasetuka nʼazwa oku kiinulo, ni yeetoolamu ekizibaawokye, kaisi nʼakwata etawulo ni yeesiba omu nkende.
Oluzwanyuma lwʼekyo nʼasuka amaizi omu kalaayi kaisi nʼatandiika okunaabya abeegibe ebigere. Yabinaabyanga neenu wabisiimuula nʼetawulo egiyabbaire yeesibire.
Awo nʼatuuka oku Simooni oPeetero, kaisi iye nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, oyaba kunnaabya bigere?”
OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Iwe totegeera ekindi kukola esaawa eenu, neye oluzwanyuma walikitegeera.”
Awo oPeetero nʼamwiramu ati, “Musengwa nze tinaliikiriryaku iwe okunnaabya ebigere.” Cooka oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Owentakunaabya ebigere, obba toli kimo na nze.”
Awo oSimooni Peetero nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, aale nga kityo tiwannaabyaku bigere byonkani, neye onnaabye paka nʼamangalo nʼomutwe gwona!”

Kale oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Iye omuntu owaabba ngʼabbaire amalire okunaaba omubiri gwonagwona, iye oyo abba yeetaaga kunaabaku bigere byonkani. Igwo omubiri gubba gutukwire. Aate era inywe muli batukulye, okutoolaku omoiza kwinywe.”
Yakobere atyo olwakubba iye yabbaire amaite ayaba okumulyamu olukwe, era niikyo ekyagirire nʼakoba ati batukulye okutoolaku omoiza kwibo.
Kale oYesu oweyamalire okunaabya abeegibe ebigere, tete nʼazwala ekizibaawokye era nʼakanga nʼatyama oku kiinulo. Awo nʼababuulya ati, “Mutegeera amakulu gʼekyo ekinkolere?
Inywe munjeta ‘Musomesya’ era muti, ‘Musengwa,’ era ekimutumula kituuce olwakubba ekyo niikyo ekyendi.
Aale atyanu nze, oMusengwa waanywe era oMusomesya waanywe ngʼowemmalire okubanaabya ebigere, na inywe nywena muli nʼokunaabyangananga ebigere.
Nze mbateekeirewo ekyokuboneraku ekimuli nʼokukola ngʼowembakoleire.
Mbakobera amazima nti mpaawo mugalama abba wʼekitiisya okukiraku omusengwawe, waire mukwenda tabba wʼekitiisya okukiraku amutumire.
Atyanu ngʼowemumaite ebintu ebyo, mwabba nʼenkabi owemwabikolanga.”

Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Tindi kutumulanga ku niinywe nywenanywena, nze mmaite abantu abenalonderemu, ikyo ekibali. Neye ekyo kyokutuukirirya Kiwandiike, ekikoba kiti, ‘Oyo ogundya naye ayaba okundyamu olukwe.’
Nze ndi kubakobera oku kintu ekyo atyanu nga kikaali okubbaawo, kaisi oolwo owekyalimala okubbaawo, mwezye okwikirirya muti ninze oyo ngʼowenetumulaku.
Era mbakobera amazima nti asangaalira buli oguntuma, abba asangaaliire ninze, era buli ansangaalira, abba asangaaliire Kibbumba oyo eyantumire.”
Kale awo oYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, ni yeeraliikirira ino omu mwoyogwe, nʼabbutula ati, “Mbakobera amazima, omoiza kwinywe ayaba okundyamu olukwe.”
Awo abeegibe ni balolanganaku, neye ni bibasobera olwʼokutamanya oguyabbaire atumulaku.
Iye omoiza oku beegi, oYesu oguyabbaire ataka eino, yabbaire atyaime kumpi nʼoYesu.
Kaisi awo oSimooni Peetero nʼagererya omwegi oyo nago ngʼamukoba ati, “Obuulye oYesu atukobere ogwatumulaku.”
Kale awo omwegi oyo nago eyabbaire atyaime okumpi nʼoYesu, nʼamweigikaku omu kifubba katono kaisi nʼamubuulya ati, “Musengwa, naani oyo ogwotumulaku?”
Iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Niiye oyo ogunaawa ekimegero kinu ekinaabba nkozerye omu syodo.” Era oYesu nʼakozya ekimegero, kaisi nʼakiwa oYuda oIsikalyoti omutaane wa Simooni.
Era oYuda oweyamalire okulya ekimegero ekyo, amangu ago oSitaani nʼamwingiramu.
Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Ekiwatira okukola, okikole mangu!”
Neye ku bonabona ababbaire awo oku kiinulo, mpaawo kadi moiza eyategeire ekyazwireku oYesu nʼakoba atyo oYuda.
Neye abamo ni baseega bati oYuda ngʼoweyabbaire niiye omuwanika, oYesu ayezya okubba amutuma kugula bintu byʼoku Mukolo, ooba amukoba kugabiraku badoobi mpiiya.
Kale oYuda oweyamalire okulya ekimegero ekyo, amangu ago nʼawuluka. Era omu kiseera ekyo omu mwoyogwe mwabbaire mwizwire endikiirya nga nʼobwire bwirugaire.

Kale awo oYuda oweyamalire okuwuluka okwaba, awo oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ababbaire basigaire awo ati, “Atyanu oMwana wa Muntu oKibbumba amugulumairye, era okubita omu Mwana nago abantu bagulumairye oKibbumba.
Kaisi obanga oKibbumba bamugulumairye kubita mu niiye, era nʼoKibbumba yagulumalya oMwana wa Muntu mangu ago.
Baana bange, naabba na inywe akaseera katono. Mwalinnoonia, era nakimo ngʼowenakobere aBayudaaya, nʼatyanu niikyo ekimbakobera nti, ‘Inywe timwezya okutuuka eginjaba.’ ”
Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Cooka mbawa ekiragiro ekiyaaka nti, mutakanganenge. Nga nze owembataka, mutyo na inywe wemuteekwa okutakangananga.
Singa owemwabbanga nʼokutakangananga, awo abantu bonabona bamanyicanga bati muli beegi bange.”
Awo oSimooni Peetero nʼabuulya oYesu ati, “Musengwa, oli kwaba yaina?”
OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Omu kiseera kinu toyezya okwabayo na nze, neye oluzwanyuma waliizayo.”
Tete oPeetero nʼamubuulya ati, “Musengwa, lwaki timpezya okwaba na iwe atyanu? Ndi mutegeki okukufeererera.”
Awo oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Iwe dala oli mutegeki okunfeererera? Nkukobera amazima nti, onkoko yaabba akaali nʼokukookoola nga wankanegaanira emirundi misatu ngʼokoba oti tommaite.”
Awo oYesu nʼakoba ati, “Timweraliikiriranga. Inywe mwikiririrye mu Kibbumba, era na nze zena munjikiririryemu.
Omu nyumba ya Bbaabba mulimu ebisenge bingi, era njaba okubategekera ekifo. Singa ekyo tikibbaire kituuce, tinandibakobere nti njabayo okubategekera ekifo.
Era owenalimala okubategekera ekifo, naliira ni mbatwala ni mubbanga na nze kaisi nywena ni mubbanga eeyo eginalibba.
Era mumaite enzira etuuka eginjaba.”
Awo oTomasi nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa titumaite egyoyaba, kale twamanya tutya enzira eyabayo?”

Awo oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Ninze enzira eyaba e wa Kibbumba, era ninze mmanyikisya abantu amazima agakwata oku oKibbumba, era ninze agaba obwomi obutawaawo. Mpaawo atuuka egiri oBbaabba okutoolaku ngʼabitire mu ninze.
Singa nze muntegeera, nʼoBbaabba yena mwandimutegeire.
Era okuzwa olwatyanu mumutegeire era muli ngʼabamuboineku.”
Awo oFiripo nʼamukoba ati, “Musengwa, otulagisye oIteewo era ekyo kyatumala.”

Iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Kasookeede mba na inywe ekiseera ekyo kyonakyona, Firipo tontegeeranga? Obanga buli muntu ambonaku, abba ngʼaboine oku Bbaabba. Tete obba otya okunkoba oti, ‘Otulagisye oIteewo?’

Iwe toikirirya oti nze ndi bumo nʼoBbaabba, era nʼoBbaabba ali bumo na nze? Ebibono ebimbakobera inywe, tibyange-kubwange. Neye oBbaabba iye aali obumo na nze, niiye akola ngʼowaataka ngʼabita mwebyo ebinkola nʼebintumula.”

Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okukoba ati, “Aale mwikirirye ebimbakobera nti nze ndi bumo nʼoBbaabba era nʼoBbaabba ali bumo na nze. Aale owemubbanga timwikirirya ebintumula, mwikirirye olwʼebyewunyo ebinkola waire byonkani.”
Mbakobera amazima nti buli anjikiririryamu, yalikola ebyewunyo ooti biibyo ebinkolanga, era yalikola nʼebikiraku ebyo olwakubba njaba egiri oBbaabba.
Era buli ekimwasabanga nga mubita omu liina lyange, nakibakoleranga, kaisi oBbaabba bamugulumalye nga babita omu Mwanawe.
Era buli owemwansabanga ekintu kyonakyona nga mubita omu liina lyange, nakikolanga.
Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okutumula nabo ati, “Owemubbanga muntaka, mwakwatanga ebiragiro byange.
Era nalisaba oBbaabba nʼabawa oMubbeeri ogondi, iye etiyalibaleka emirembe nʼemirembe.

OMwoyo nago niiye amanyikisya abantu amazima agakwata oku Kibbumba. Cooka ibo abataikiririrya omu Kibbumba tibeezya okwikirirya Mwoyo nago olwakubba tibamutegeera, era tibamumaite. Neye inywe mumumaite olwakubba abba na inywe, era yatyamanga omu myoyo gyanywe.
Era tinalibalekawo okubba ooti bafuubbi olwakubba owemwalisuna oMwoyo nago kyalibba ooti ninze njirire egimuli.
Omu kiseera kitono kiti, ibo abataikiririrya omu Kibbumba baabbanga tibakaali bambona, neye inywe mwalimbona olwakubba tete nalibba mwomi, era nywena mwalibba boomi.
Era oku lunaku oolwo tete olumwalimboneraku nga mmalire okuzuukira mwalitegeera muti nze ndi bumo nʼoBbaabba, era muti nywena muli bumo na nze, era tete muti nze ndi bumo na inywe.
Buli awulira ebiragiro byange nʼabikwata, oyo niiye antaka. Era oBbaabba yatakanga oyo antaka, zena natakanga omuntu oyo, era namubiikuliranga ikyo ekyendi.”
Kale awo oYuda, neye nga tiyoodi oIsikalyoti, nʼamubuulya ati, “Neye Musengwa, lwaki ogenderera kutubiikulira niiswe tumanye ikyo ekyoli, kaisi nandi nʼobiikulira ibo abantu abandi oku kyalo?”
OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Omuntu yenayena antaka, yakwatanga ebibono byange ebimmukoba. Nʼolwekyo oBbaabba yamutakanga era nze nʼoBbaabba twaizanga egyali ni tubbanga aamo naye.
Iye oyo atantaka, takwata ebibono ebyo aate ngʼebibono nago ebyembakobera tibyange, wazira bya Bbaabba era eyantumire.”
OYesu ni yeeyongera okukoba ati, “Mbakobeire ebyo byonabyona nga nkaali ndi na inywe.
Neye oMubbeeri, iye oMwoyo oMweru oyo oBbaabba oguyalituma omu kigere kyange, yalibeegesya byonabyona era yalibeewukirya byonabyona ebimbakobeire.
Aale atyanu mbalekera eidembe, era mbawa eidembe eryange. Iryo erimbawa tiriwaawo, era tiriri ooti liiryo abantu eribasuna oku kyalo. Nʼolwekyo timweraliikiriranga era timwatyanga olwʼebyabbangawo.”
Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Muwuliire nga mbakobera nti ‘njaba, neye naira egimuli.’ Aale singa mubbaire muntaka, mwandisangaire nze okwaba egiri oBbaabba olwakubba iye ankiraku ekitiisya.
Ebyo mbibakobeire atyanu nga bikaali okubbaawo, kaisi owebyalimala okubbaawo mwezye okunjikiririryamu.
Cooka tineeyongere okutumula na inywe olwakubba oSitaani omufugi wʼekyalo kinu aiza okunnumba. Neye abula obwezye kwebyo ebintuukaku.
Wazira, ibo abantu abatali ba Kibbumba bateekwa okumanya okusinzirira kwebyo ebintuukaku bati ntaka oBbaabba. Era bati ndi kukolanga biidi oBbaabba ebiyandagiire.”
Awo nʼamaliirirya ati, “Aale atyanu mwize twabe.”
Awo oYesu nʼakoba abeegibe ati, “Ninze ekitina kyʼomuzabbibbu ogunanyerenyeere, kaisi oBbaabba niiye omulimi waagwo.
Ansalaku buli isaga erindiku eritaneneka neenu nga waasalira
lidi erineneka kaisi lyezye okubala ino.
Kale inywe atyanu muli batukulye ooti masaga omulimi agaamalire okusalira olwakubba mwaikiriirye obukwenda obunalaabbire egimuli.

Aale musigale nga muli bumo na nze, era zena nga ndi bumo na inywe. Ekyo kityo olwakubba mpaawo isaga erineneka okulwalyo. Liri nʼokubba ku kitina kaisi ni lineneka. Kale nywena timwezya kukola ebikole oKibbumba ebyabasuubiriramu nga timuli bumo na nze.”

Awo ni yeeyongera ati, “Ndi ooti kitina kyʼomuzabbibbu, kaisi inywe ni mubba ooti masaga. Kale omuntu owaabba obumo na nze kaisi zena ni mba obumo naye akola ebikole ebisa bingi. Iye oyo abba ooti masaga agali oku muzabbibbu agabala ebineneka ebingi. Era anambula obubbeeri bwange mpaawo ekimwezya okukola.
Kale omuntu owaatabba obumo na nze, abba ooti isaga eribamuma eedi era ni liwotoka. Era agatyo niigo agebatoola ni bagamuma omu musyo ni gaya.
Neye owemubba obumo na nze, era ni musigala nga mukolera oku bibono ebimbakoba, mwezya okusaba kyonakyona ekimutaka era oKibbumba yakibawanga.
Kale owemukola ebikole ebisa ebingi, oBbaabba bamugulumalya era mubba mweragire muti muli beegi bange.”
Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okubakoba ati, “Atyo nakimo ngʼoBbaabba owantakire, zena niiyo engeri egimbatakamu inywe. Mweyongere okubba obumo na nze kaisi neyongere okubataka.
Atyanu, singa owemwakwatanga ebimbalagira, zena neyongeranga okubataka. Era kityo nakimo nga zena owenkwatanga ebyo oBbaabba ebyandagira ni yeeyongera okuntaka.”
Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Mbakobeire ebintu ebyo, kaisi oolwo mubbe nʼeisangaalo eriri ooti lyange erindi nalyo, era mubbe nalyo omu bwizulye.
Era ekiragiro kyange niikyo kinu ekiti, mutakanganenge, nga nze owenabatakire.
Mpaawo muntu aali nʼokutaka okukiraku okwʼoyo awaayo obwomibwe olwʼabakaagwabe.
Singa musigala nga mukola ebimbalagira mulaga muti muli bakaagwa bange.
Nze tinkaali mbeeta baweererya olwakubba omuweererya tamanya omusengwawe ebyakola. Wazira mbeeta bakaagwa bange olwakubba inywe mbakobeire byonabyona oBbaabba ebiyankobeire.

Era tiniinywe omwasalirewo okubba beegi bange, neye ninze enabalonderemu inywe era ni mbateekawo okukolanga ebikole ebisa. Kaisi awo oBbaabba ayezye okubawanga buli ekimusaba nga mubita omu liina lyange.
Era kinu niikyo ekimbalagira nti mutakanganenge.”
Kale awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okukoba ati, “Singa abantu abataikiririrya omu Kibbumba owebabacaawanga, mwewukiryenge muti basookere kucaawa ninze.

Kale singa mubbaire bamo kwibo nago bandibbaire babataka nga inywe abaabwe. Kiri kiti, timuli bamo kwibo wazira inywe nabalonderemu okuzwa omu bantu abo. Ekyo niikyo ekigira abo abanjakanisya ni babacaawa.

Aale mwewukirye ebibono ebinabakobeire nti, ‘Mpaawo mugalama abba owʼekitiisya okukiraku omusengwawe.’ Owekibba nti nze banjiigaanirye, na inywe nywena balibagadya, era ngʼowekiri nti bakwaite okwegesya kwange, nʼebyanywe byona balibikwata.
Ibo baaba okubagadyanga olwakubba inywe muli bange, era olwakubba tibamaite oyo eyantumire.
Aale singa tinaizire ni ntumula nabo, oKibbumba tiyandibbaire abalumiriza olwʼekibbikibbi. Neye atyanu babula kyokuwozyeryaku olwʼekibbikibbi kyabwe.
Iye ancaawa acaawa nʼoBbaabba yena.

Aale singa tibaboine nga nkola ebyamagero ebyo omuntu yenayena ogondi ebyatakolangaku, oKibbumba tiyandibbaire abasalira omusango olwʼekibbikibbi. Neye atyanu baboine ebyamagero ebyo, kaisi era ni basigala nga batucaawa nze nʼoBbaabba.
Neye ebyo ibyo byokutuukirirya kibawandiikire omwIteeka lyabwe bati, ‘Bancaawire anambula nsonga.’ ”

Kale oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Omubbeeri oweyaliiza oyo ogunalibasindikira ngʼazwa egiri oBbaabba, yalikobera abantu ebinkwataku. Omubbeeri oyo nago yalibba Mwoyo atumula amazima agakwata oku Bbaabba era azwera nakimo egiri oBbaabba.
Era nywena muteekwa okukobera abandi ebinkwataku olwakubba mubbaire na nze kuzwera nakimo owenatandiikiire okwegesya.”
Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Ebyo byonabyona mbibakobeire kaisi timwesiitaala ni muleka okwikirirya kwanywe.
Balibabbinga omu makumbaaniro. Era amazima gali gati, ekiseera kyaba okutuuka nga buli abaita inywe aseega ati omu kukola ekyo aweererya Kibbumba.
Ebyo balibibakola olwaibo okutamanya oBbaabba ekyali, ooba nze ekyendi.

Neye ebyo mbibakobeire, kaisi oolwo ekiseera kyabyo owekyalituuka, mwezye okwewukirya muti nabalabwire.” Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okutumula nabo ati, “Omu ntandiika yʼokwikirirya kwanywe, tinabakobeire oku byokubagadya ebyo olwakubba nabbaire nkaali ndi na inywe.”
“Neye atyanu njaba egiri oyo eyantumire, wazira mpaawo kwinywe ambuulya eginjaba.
Inywe olwakubba mbakobeire nti njaba okubazwaku, tete emyoyo gyanywe giirire ni giizula nima.
Neye mbakobera amazima nti nze okubazwaku okwaba egiri oBbaabba kibagasa niinywe olwakubba owentayaba, omubbeeri oMwoyo oMweru tiyaliiza egimuli. Cooka owenjaba, nalimutuma egimuli.

Era Iye oweyaliiza, yalirumiriza abataikiririrya omu Kibbumba ati enseega yaabwe tintuuce oku bikwata oku kibbikibbi nʼoku muntuki omutuukirirye. Era yalibalaga nʼoku muntu wʼengeriki oKibbumba oguyalisingisya omusango.
Era omusango ogwo gwalibba gusinzirira ku kibbikibbi ekyʼomuntu ekyokutanjikiririryamu.
Era oMwoyo oMweru yaliraga ati enseega yaabwe tintuuce oku butuukirirye bwange olwakubba nkanga egiri oBbaabba eeyo egimwabba nga timukaali mumbona.
Nʼokubikwata oku kusala omusango, era byona oMwoyo oMweru yalikakasa abantu ngʼoKibbumba oweyamalire okusingisya oSitaani omusango. Era oSitaani oyo nago niiye omufugi wʼabantu abakola ebibbibibbi.”
Awo oYesu era nʼabakoba ati, “Nkaali ndi na bingi ebyokubakobera, neye byabba ngʼatyanu bibitiriri inywe okubikwata.

Neye iye oMwoyo amanyikisya abantu amazima agakwata oku Kibbumba oweyaliiza, yalibalungamya ni mumanya amazima ago gonagona. Ekyo kityo olwakubba tiyalitumula kululwe, wazira yalitumulanga biibyo byonkani ebiyaliwuliranga okuzwa egiri oKibbumba, era nʼokubakoberanga ebyaba okwiza.
Era oMwoyo oyo yangulumalyanga olwakubba yabakoberanga kiikyo ekiyawuliranga okuzwa egyendi.
Kale ebintu byonabyona oBbaabba ebyalinabyo byange, era ekyo niikyo ekigira ni mbakoba inywe nti oMwoyo yabakoberanga biibyo ebiyawuliranga okuzwa egyendi.”
Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Omwibbanga litono mwabba nga timukaali mumbona, kaisi tete oluzwanyuma lwʼeibbanga litono, mumbone.”

Awo abamo oku beegibe ni bakobangana bati, “Ategeeza niki okutukoba ati, ‘Omwibbanga litono mwabba nga timukaali mumbona, kaisi oluzwanyuma lwʼeibbanga litono tete mumbone,’ era ati, ‘Ekyo kityo olwakubba njaba egiri oBbaabba?’ ”
Era ni beegumya okwebuulyangana bati, “Ategeeza niki okukoba ati, ‘Mwibbanga litono?’ Cooka titutegeera ekyo ekyakoba.”

Awo oYesu nʼategeera ati bataka okumubuulya oku bintu ebyo, kale nʼabakoba ati, “Muli kwebuulyangana ku kintegeezere owenkobere nti, ‘Omwibbanga litono mwabba nga timukaali mumbona, kaisi tete oluzwanyuma lwʼeibbanga litono, mumbone?’
Aale mbakobera amazima nti, inywe mwalikunganga era mwalikubbanga enduulu, neenu abantu abakola ebyʼekyalo nga ibo bajaagaana. Inywe enima yalibakwata, neye tete enima yaanywe yalisuukamu isangaalo.

Cooka kyalibba ooti mukali alumwa. Iye abba omu bulumi bungi olwakubba ekiseerakye kibba kituukire. Neye owaamala okubyala, yeerabira okugada okunene okwabbairemu, olwʼeisangaalo eryʼokubyala omwana oku kyalo.
Kale inywe, atyanu ikyo kiseera kyanywe ekyenima, neye tete nalibabona era ni musangaala, era mpaawo eyalibatoolaku eisangaalo lyanywe.
Era ekiseera ekyo owekyalituuka mwalibbanga tete mpaawo ekimunsaba. Cooka mbakobera amazima nti oBbaabba yalibba ngʼabawa buli ekimumusaba omu liina lyange.
Wazira paka lwatyanu mubbaire mukaali okumusabangaku ekintu kyonakyona omu liina lyange. Neye atyanu aale musabenge era mwalisuna, nʼeisangaalo lyanywe lyalibba mu bwizulye.”

Era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati, “Waire nga nzwa okutumulanga ebintu ebyo mu ngero, ekiseera kyaba okutuuka mbe nga tinkaali ntumula nga nkolesya ntumula eeyo, wazira nga mbakobera lwatu ebifa oku Bbaabba.
Era omu kiseera ekyo mwalibbanga musaba mu liina lyange. Cooka tindi kukoba nti kyalyetaagisyanga ninze okubasabiranga egiri oBbaabba okubawa ekimwasabanga.
Wazira oBbaabba iye onyere abataka yabawanga ekimwamusabanga olwakubba muntaka era mwikirirya muti nazwire giri niiye.
Nze nazwire giri Bbaabba kaisi ni njiza oku kyalo. Kale atyanu ndi kuzwa oku kyalo, era nkanga egiri oBbaabba.”
Awo abeegi ba Yesu ni bakoba bati, “Cooka awo atyanu oli kutumulanga lwatu era nga tokolesya ngero.
Era atyanu tutegeire tuti omaite ebintu byonabyona, era tuti tikyetaagisya waire nʼomuntu yenayena okukubuulya ebibuulyo. Era ekyo kituzweramu kwikirirya tuti wazwire giri Kibbumba.”
Kale awo oYesu nʼababuulya ati, “Atyanu mwikirirya?
Neye ekiseera kiiza, era kituukire, owemwasalaanikira buli muntu okukanga e wuwe. Inywe mwaba kundeka zenkani. Cooka ekinyere kiri kiti tinaabbe zenkani olwakubba oBbaabba ali aamo na nze.

Era ebyo mbibakobeire, kaisi oolwo mubbe nʼeidembe omu myoyo gyanywe olwʼenkolagana yaanywe na nze. Cooka oku kyalo kunu mwabbanga nʼokugada, neye mugume olwakubba nze mpangwire amaani gʼekyalo kinu.”
Awo oYesu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼagangamula omutwe okulingirira omwigulu kaisi nʼasaba ati:
“Bbaabba, ekiseera kituukire. Aale atyanu
olage abantu ekitiisya kyʼoMwanawo ngʼowekiri
ekyʼamaani, kaisi yena ayezye okubalaga ekitiisyakyo ekyʼamaani.
Ekyo kityo olwakubba wamuwaire
obwezye oku bantu bonabona, kaisi ayezye
okubawa ibo nago abewamuwaire obwomi
obutawaawo.
Era ibwo obwomi obutawaawo
obwo busunika mu ngeri eenu eti: Abantu bali
nʼokukumanya niiwe oKibbumba wenkani
onanyerenyeere, era nʼokumanya oYesu Kurisito
oguwatumire okununula abantu.
Nze ndagire
abantu ekitiisyakyo ngʼowekiri ekyʼamaani omu
kukola era ni mmala omulimo oguwampaire okukola.
Bbaabba, aale atyanu tete onganye mbe
nʼekitiisya kidi ekinabbaire nakyo owenabbaire
na iwe omwigulu nga nʼekyalo kikaali nʼokubbaawo.”
Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okusaba ati,
“Mmanyikisirye abantu abewampaire, ikyo
ekyo ekyoli. Abantu abo nago niibo abewampaire
ngʼobatoola mu badi abakwikiririryamu. Ibo
abantu abo babbaire babo, nʼobampa era bakwaite
ekibonokyo.
Era atyanu bamaite bati obukwenda
nʼebyo byonabyona ebinkola bizwa giri niiwe.
Ekyo kityo olwakubba nabakobeire ebibono
ebiwampaire, era ni babiikirirya. Era bakakasiire nakimo
bati nazwire giri niiwe, era ni baikirirya bati
wantumire.
Kale mbasabira. Cooka
tindi kusabiranga bantu abatakwikiriryamu, wazira
nsabira baabo abewampaire olwakubba babo.
Era abo abendi nabo bonabona babo, nʼababo
era bange. Era balagire bati ekitiisya kyange
kyʼamaani.
Aale atyanu nze ngonu njaba okuzwa
oku kyalo era ndi kwiza egyoli neye ibo bakaali
bali oku kyalo. Iwe Bbaabba oMweru,
obakuumenge omu bwezyebwo obuwampaire kaisi
beezye okubbanga nakimo ooti niiswe owetuli ekimo.
Era owenabbaire nabo, cooka olwʼobwezye
obuwampaire, nabakuumire era ekigosi nandi
kibatuukaku. Era mpaawo kwibo eyagotereku
okutoolaku oyo eyabbaire ateekwa okugota kaisi
eKiwandiike kyezye okutuukirira.”
Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okusaba ati,
“Aale ngonu atyanu njiza egyoli, neye ebyo
mbitumula nga nkaali ndi oku kyalo kaisi
eisangaalo lyange libbe mu bwizulye omu
basengereri bange.
Era nabawaire ekibonokyo
nʼolwekyo ekyalo ni kibacaawa olwakubba nti ibo
nago tibakaali bʼekyalo ooti ninze owentali
wʼekyalo.
Cooka tinkusaba nti obatoole oku
kyalo, wazira nti obakuume eeri omubbimubbi
oSitaani.
Nti ibo tibekyalo ooti ninze owentali
waakyo.
Aale obatukulye ngʼokolesya
obwezye bwʼekibonokyo. Nti ekibonokyo niigo
amazima.
Cooka ngʼowewantumire oku kyalo, ntyo
zena niiyo owembatumire oku kyalo.
Nze
newaayo egyoli kaisi bona abanyere beezye
okweweerayo nakimo egyoli.”
Awo oYesu ni yeeyongera okusaba ati,
“Tinsabira beegi banu bonkani, neye nʼabo
abalinjikiririryamu olwʼobukwenda bwa banu.
Era Bbaabba, ekyo kityo kaisi bonabona babbenge
bumo, ooti niiwe owooli obumo na nze, era zena
owendi obumo na iwe. Mbasabira nti bona
babbenge bumo na iswe kaisi abantu beezye
okwikirirya bati iwe wantumire.
Era
mbasuucirye okubba bʼekitiisya zena
ngʼowonsuucirye kaisi beezye okubbanga bumo ooti
ninze owendi obumo na iwe.
Ekikoba kiti, ntaka
ibo beegaite nga ibo owebali bagaite na nze era
nga iwe owooli mugaite na nze. Era mbasabira nti
babbeere nakimo bumo, kaisi abantu bategeere bati
wantumire, era obataka ngʼowontaka.”
Era oYesu ni yeeyongera ati,
“Bbaabba, abantu abewampaire, ntaka lubbe
lumo nga bali na nze omwigulu eeyo eginjaba okubba,
era babbeeyo okubonaku ekitiisya ekinalibbaamu.
Cooka ekitiisya ekyo wakimpaire olwakubba
wantakire nga nʼekyalo tikibbumbe.
Bbaabba
omutuukirirye, abantu tibakumaite, neye nze
nkumaite, era bamaite bati wantumire.
Era
nabamanyikisirye ikyo ekyo ekyoli, era njaba
okweyongera okubamanyikisya ikyo ekyo nago,
kaisi bona batakenge abantu abandi ooti niiwe
owewantakire era kaisi nze mbe kimo nabo.”

Awo oYesu oweyamalire okusaba okwo, nʼasimbuka nʼabeegibe, ni basalamu ogwinamo ogubeeta bati Kidulooni. Okwitale kudi okubasomokere wabbaireyo omusiri gwʼemisaale emizaituuni era iye nʼabeegibe ni baingira oomwo.
Atyanu iye oYuda, eyamuliiremu olukwe, yabbaire amaite ekifo ekyo olwakubba oYesu yatiranga okwaba nʼakumbaana eeyo nʼabeegibe.

Kale awo oYuda nʼayaba omu musiri ogwo nago ngʼakudembereire ekibinja kyʼabaisulukale, nʼabakuumi abamo abʼeYeekaalu. Era ibo abo abeyabbaire yeekubbembereire, abakabona abakulu nʼaBafalisaayo niibo ababbaire babatumire. Era ibo nago babbaire bakwaite ebimoleka ooti mole nʼamataala era nʼebyokulwanisya.
Cooka oYesu yamaite byonabyona ebyaba okumutuukaku, kale awo ni yeetoolayo, era nʼababuulya ati, “Munoonia naani?”
Awo ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Yesu owʼe Naazaleesi.” OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Ninze onu.” Era oYuda eyamuliiremu olukwe, yabbaire ayemereire awo nabo.
Cooka oYesu oweyabakobere ati, “Ninze onu,” ibo ni baira e nyuma era ni bagwa ansi.
Awo oYesu nʼababuulya omulundi ogwokubiri ati, “Munoonia naani?” Tete ni bairamu bati, “Yesu owʼe Naazaleesi.”
Era oYesu nʼabairamu ati, “Mbakobeire nti ninze onu. Aale obanga munoonia ninze, muleke abeegi bange banu ibo baabe.”
Ekyo kyabbairewo kaisi oolwo ebibono ebiyabbaire atumwire byezye okutuukirira, ebikoba biti, “Kwabo abewampaire tinagoteryeku kadi moiza.”

Cooka oSimooni Peetero omoiza oku beegi ba Yesu yabbaire nʼempiima, kale awo nʼagitoolayo, nʼatemaku omugalama wa kabona akira obukulu ekitwi ekyʼoku ndiiro, nʼamutiicaaku. Era omugalama oyo nago yabbaire niiye oMaluko.
Awo oYesu nʼalagira oPeetero ati, “Empiimayo ogikanjeeyo omu kiruutu kyayo. Iwe oseega oti tindi nʼokubita omu kipimo kyokugada kudi oBbaabba okwataka mbitemu?”
Awo ekibinja kyʼabaisulukale nʼomuduumiri waabwe, era nʼabakungu bʼaBayudaaya ni bakwata oYesu. Awo ni bamusibira aamo engalogye e nyuma,
kaisi ni basooka bamutwala egiri Anasi. Oyo yabbaire niiye oiteeye wa muka Kayaafa era oKayaafa oyo yabbaire niiye okabona akira obukulu omu mwanka ogwo.
Era oKayaafa nago niiye eyabbaire awaire aBayudaaya amalabuki ati kibba kisa omuntu omoiza okufeererera abantu.
Awo oSimooni Peetero nʼomwegi omwinaye ni basenjaaku oYesu. Cooka omwegi oyo olwakubba yabbaire mumanye eeri okabona akira obukulu, iye nʼasenjaaku oYesu ni baingira omu luuga lwa kabona oyo.
Neye iye oPeetero yabbaire nʼokukuumira nza ku geeti. Kale omwegi oodi nago eyabbaire omumanye, nʼakanga e nza okutumula nʼomwala eyabbaire omukuumi wʼoku geeti, era nʼaingirya oPeetero.
Awo omwala oyo nago nʼabuulya oPeetero ati, “Wena toli moiza oku beegi bʼomusaiza nago?” Iye oPeetero nʼamwiramu ati, “Nze bbe.”

Cooka empewo yabbaireku era abagalama ba kabona akira obukulu nʼabakuumi bʼeYeekaalu babbaire beemereire okweruguulirirya ekisiki kyʼomusyo ekibabbaire bakumire okwota. Kale awo oPeetero yena yabbaire ayemereire nabo ngʼayota omusyo.
Awo, okabona akira obukulu nʼabuulya oYesu oku beegibe, nʼokwebyo iye oYesu ebyayegesya.

Iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Nze ntumulanga lwatu eeri abantu. Nze nenca njegesyanga omu makumbaaniro nʼomu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu aBayudaaya bonabona omu bakumbaaniranga. Tintumulangaku kintu kadi kimo omu kyama.
Kale aale lwaki obuulya ninze? Obuulye baadi abawuliranga ebinatumulanga. Mazima ibo babimaite.”
Awo oYesu oweyatumwire ebyo, omoiza oku bakuumi bʼeYeekaalu eyabbaire okumpi nʼoYesu, nʼamukubba oluwi okwitama neenu waamukoba ati, “Eyo niiyo engeri egyoiramu okabona akira obukulu?”
Iye oYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Obanga ekintumwire tikituuce, kaade okakase obutali butuuce bwakyo. Neye obanga ntumwire kituuce, lwaki onkubbire?”
Awo oYesu ngʼakaali musibe wʼengalogye Anasi nʼamuweererya egiri oKayaafa okabona akira obukulu.
Awo oSimooni Peetero oweyabbaire ngʼayemereire ayota omusyo, tete ni wabbaawo omuntu ogondi nʼamubuulya ati, “Iwe wena toli moiza oku beegi bʼomusaiza nago?” Iye ni yeegaana ngʼakoba ati, “Nze bbe.”
Cooka omoiza oku baweererya ba kabona akira obukulu, era omuganda wʼoodi oPeetero oguyatiiciryeku ekitwi, nʼamulumiriza ati, “Tinakuboine naye eedi omu musiri gwʼemisaale emizaituuni?”
Awo tete era oPeetero nʼakyegaana, era nʼomu kiseera ekyo onkoko nʼakookoola.

Awo oYesu ni bamutoola e wa Kayaafa, ni bamutwala omu lubiri lwʼomufugi omu Looma. Omu kiseera ekyo obwire bwabbaire bwankaca. Era aBayudaaya tibaingiire omu lubiri olwakubba okwingira kyabbaire kibasuuca okubba tibatukulye era ni babba nga tibasaanira okulya oku Mukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya.
Nʼolwekyo oPiraato nʼawuluka nza egibali era nʼababuulya ati, “Musangoki ogumuvunaana omusaiza onu?”
Ibo ni bamwiramu bati, “Singa abbaire abula musango, titwandimuleetere okumukukwatisya.”
Awo oPiraato nʼabakoba ati, “Aale atyanu inywe mumutwale mumuwozesye okusinzirira oku mateeka agaanywe.”
ABayudaaya ni bamukoba bati, “Nti iswe tibatwikirirya kwita muntu yenayena.”
Ekyo kyabbairewo kaisi oYesu ebibono ebiyabbaire atumwire ngʼalaga engeri egiyabbaire ayaba okufaamu, byezye okutuukirira.
Awo oPiraato nʼakanga omu lubiri, kaisi nʼalagira ni beeta oYesu kaisi nʼamubuulya ati, “Niiwe okabaka wʼaBayudaaya?”
OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Ekyo kiseegokyo, ooba bandi niibo abakukobeire ebinkwataku?”
Awo oPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Nze ndi Muyudaaya? Ibo bantu bʼeigwangalyo, nʼabakabona baanywe abakulu niibo abakunkwatisirye. Olwo nago niki ekyokolere?”
OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Obwakabaka bwange tibwa ku kyalo kunu. Singa ekyo kibbaire kityo, abantu bange bandirwaine, ni bakaisya aBayudaaya okunkwata. Neye obwakabaka obwange ibwo buzwa awandi.”
Awo oPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Olwo oli kabaka?”

OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Otuucirye okukoba oti ndi kabaka. Igo amazima gali gati, nze bambyaire kubba Kabaka era niikyo ekyandetere oku kyalo kunu era nʼokukakasa abantu amazima. Era buli ataka amazima, ampulisisya.”
Awo oPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Amazima niikyo niki?”
OPiraato oweyamalire okubuulya oYesu ebyo, iye oPiraato nʼawuluka tete e nza egiri aBayudaaya era nʼabakoba ati, “Timbona ekyokuzweraku okumuvunaana omusango gwonagwona.
Neye inywe munaliriire nze okubateererangaku omusibe moiza oku lunaku lwʼoMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya. Kale oolwo mutaka mbateerere nago yoodi ogumukoba muti kabaka wʼaBayudaaya?”
Cooka ibo ni bakooka nga bamwiramu bati, “Bbe, tiyooyo! Otuwe Bbalaba!” OBbalaba oyo nago yabbaire musibe olwʼakeediimo akeyabbaire yeemigiiremu.
Awo oPiraato nʼalagira abaisulukale okutwala oYesu bamufaamuule nʼofaalu aliku emirobo egisima.
Era abaisulukale ni baluka engule eya mawa kaisi ni bagimuzwalisya oku mutwe. Bamuzwalisirye nʼekizwalo ekitukuliikiriri,
era ni basoosera okumwabaku okumukiina bati, “Owangaale, iwe oKabaka wʼaBayudaaya!” Era batyo nga webamukubba empi oku matama.
Awo oPiraato era tete nʼawuluka e nza, nʼakoba aBayudaaya ati, “Aale mumpulisisyeku, ngonu njaba okumuwuluca egimuli okubamanyikisya nti timbona ekyokuzweraku okumuvunaana omusango gwonagwona.”
Awo oYesu ni bamuwuluca nga bamutiikire engule eyʼamawa, era nga bamuzwalisirye ekizwalo ekitukuliikiriri kaisi oPiraato nʼabakoba ati, “Aale mubone omusaiza nago!”
Amangu ago ibo abakabona abakulu nʼabakuumi bʼeYeekaalu owebamuboine, ni bakooka bati, “Omukomerere oku musalabba, omukomerere oku musalabba!”
Neye oPiraato nʼabakoba ati, “Inywe mumutwale mumukomerere, neye okulwange timbona ekyokuzweraku okumuvunaana omusango gwonagwona.”
Era ibo aBayudaaya ni beekalangula bati, “Iswe tuli nʼeiteeka, era okusinzirira okwiteeka eeryo, ateekwa kufa olwakubba yeeyeta okubba Mwana wa Kibbumba.”
Awo oPiraato oweyawuliire ekyo, era ni yeeyongera ino okutya.
Kale nʼalagira ni bakanjaayo oYesu omu lubiri kaisi nʼayaba nʼabuulya oYesu ati, “Ozwera yaina?” Neye oYesu tiyamwiriremu.
Awo oPiraato nʼamubuulya ati, “Ogaine okunjiramu? Tomaite oti ndi nʼobwezye okukuteera ooba okukukomerera oku musalabba?”
OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Tiwandibbaireku nʼobwezye singa tiKibbumba kubukuwa. Nʼolwekyo iye oodi ampaireyo egyoli niiye aali nʼekibbikibbi ekikiraku.”

Okuzwa omu kiseera ekyo oPiraato nʼagezyaku okuteera oYesu neye aBayudaaya nga beeyongera kukooka bati, “Singa oteera omusaiza oyo, waabba toli mukaagwa wa Kaisaali. Nti omuntu yenayena iye eyeeyeta okubba kabaka, abba ayakanisya Kaisaali.”

Awo oPiraato oweyawuliire ebyo, nʼalagira ni bawuluca oYesu oku luuga. Era oku luuga awo oPiraato nʼatyama oku ntebeye eyʼobulamuzi omu kifo ekibeeta bati Kya Mabbaale aMaalirire, neye omu Lwebbulaniya bati, Gabbasa.
Era esaawa gyabbaire ooti mukaaga egyʼomusana oku lunaku lwa kutegeka oMukolo ogwʼoKutambukirya. Awo oPiraato nʼakoba aBayudaaya ati, “Aale mumpulisisyeku, okabaka waanywe ngoyo!”
Neye ibo era ni bakooka bati, “Omumalewo, omumalewo, omukomerere oku musalabba!”
Awo oPiraato nʼababuulya ati, “Okabaka waanywe gumbe nkomerere oku musalabba?”
Abakabona abakulu ni bamwiramu bati, “Tubula kabaka gondi, wazira oKaisaali.”
Kale awo omu kukomenkereza, oPiraato nʼabakwatisya oYesu baabe bamukomerere oku musalabba.
Awo abaisulukale ni bakwata oYesu, ni bamutoolawo.
Era omu kwaba yabbaire nga yeetiikire omusalabbagwe okwaba omu kifo ekibeeta ekyʼeKiyanga, omu Lwebbulaniya ekibeeta Gologoosa.
Era omu kifo ekyo niiyo egibamukomereire oku musalabba. Era omu kifo ekinyere ekyo ni bakomerera nʼabandi babiri oku misalabba gyabwe, oku lubba nʼolubba, oYesu nga iye abalimu akati.
Awo oPiraato nʼalagira ni bawandiika ekiwandiiko, ni bakikubbirira e ngulu oku musalabba, nga kisoma kiti, “OYESU OWʼE NAAZALEESI, OKABAKA WʼABAYUDAAYA.”

Era aBayudaaya bangi ni basoma ekiwandiiko ekyo olwakubba ekifo ekyo egibakomereire oYesu, kyabbaire kumpi nʼekibuga. Era nti nʼekiwandiiko ekyo nago babbaire bakiwandiikire mu Lwebbulaniya, nʼomu Lulantini, nʼomu Luyonaani.

Awo abakabona abakulu abʼaBayudaaya ni bakanga egiri oPiraato okwezuluguma bati, “Tibandikiwandiikire bati, ‘Kabaka wʼaBayudaaya,’ wazira tutaka bakiwandiike bati, ‘Omusaiza onu abbaire yeeyeta Kabaka wʼaBayudaaya.’ ”
Awo oPiraato nʼabairamu ati, “Ekyo ekyendagiire nti bawandiike kiri nʼokubba kinyere ekyo.”

Cooka abaisulukale owebamalire okukomerera oYesu oku musalabba, ni batwala ebizwalobye, ni babigabulamu emigabo eena, buli mwisulukale nʼasunaku gumo. Neye iyo ekanzuye eyʼomunda iyo nʼesigala. Iyo babbaire tibagitungire-butungi, neye nga bagirukire-buluki yonayona okuzwa angulu paka ansi.
Kale abaisulukale ni bakobangana bati, “Titwaginyiiramu, neye tugikubbireku kalulu okusalawo eyagitwala.”
Ekyo kyabbairewo kutuukirirya Kiwandiike ekikoba kiti:
“Bagabanire ebizwalo byange,
era ekanzu yange ni bagikubbiraku akalulu.”
Kale abaisulukale bona ekyo niikyo ekibakolere.
Awo okumpi nʼomusalabba gwa Yesu, wabbairewo omaaye, nʼomuganda wa maaye, nʼoMalyamu omuka Kulopaasi, era nʼoMalyamu oMangadaleena nga beemereire.
Kale oYesu oweyaboinewo omaaye, nʼomwegi oodi oYesu oguyatakanga eino nga beemereire okumpi aawo, nʼakoba omaaye ati, “Mama, oyo omutwale ngʼomwanawo,”
era nʼakoba nʼomwegiwe oyo nago ati, “Oyo omutwale ngʼomaawo.” Okuzwa oolwo omwegi oyo nʼatandiika okulabirira omaaye wa Yesu ngʼomoiza oku bantu bʼomu kisitokye.
Awo oluzwanyuma ngʼoYesu amalire okumanya ati amalire emirimo egibamutumire okukola era okutuukirirya eKiwandiike, nʼakoba ati, “Enyonta enduma.”
Abaisulukale babbaire bateekere awo ensaka eizwire enviinyo ensasaami kale ni batimyamu ekijuulo. Awo ni bakiteeka oku kasaale akebeeta yisopu, kaisi ni basiirya okukituuca oku munwagwe.
Awo oYesu oweyafunfuunireku enviinyo ensasaami egyo, nʼakoba ati, “Kiwoire.” Era nʼekibono ekyo nʼakotamya omutwe, era nʼafa.

Awo, lwabbaire lunaku lwa kutegeka era ngʼeizo lwabba Saabbaato olukulu. Kale olwakubba abeekubbemberi bʼaBayudaaya babbaire tibataka emirambo okutuuca oku Saabbaato nga giri oku musalabba, ni basaba oPiraato olukusa bavune ebigere bya bantu nago era nʼemirambo bagyanuleyo.
Nʼolwekyo abaisulukale ni baiza okuvuna ebigere byabwe moiza moiza nga basookera oku basaiza badi abebabbaire bakomereire aamo nʼoYesu buli muntu oku musalabbagwe.
Neye owebatuukire oku Yesu, ni babona nga iye amalire okufa, tibamuvunire ebigere.
Awo, iye omu kifo kyʼokumuvuna, omoiza oku baisulukale nʼamusumuta eisimo omu mpete okukakasa ngʼafiire, amangu ago ni muzwamu eisaaye nʼamaizi.
Era omusaiza eyaboineku ngʼekyo kibbaawo yakikobeire abantu, era nʼekiyabakobeire ni kibba kituuce. Iye omusaiza nago amaite ati atumula mazima era akola atyo kaisi nywena mwezye okwikirirya.
Ebyo byabbairewo kaisi oolwo eKiwandiike kituukirire ekikoba kiti, “Tibalimuvunaku eigumba kadi limo,”
era nga nʼeKiwandiike ekindi owekikoba kiti, “Baliringirira yoodi ibo ogubalibba basumutire.”

Ebyo owebyawoire, oYusufu owʼAlimasaaya, nʼayaba nʼasaba oPiraato omulambo gwa Yesu. Era oYusufu oyo nago yabbaire mwegi wa Yesu, neye nga wʼomu mbiso olwʼokutya aBayudaaya. Awo ngʼasunire olukusa okuzwa eeri oPiraato, nʼayaba nʼatoolayo omulambo gwa Yesu.
OYusufu yabbaire nʼoNikodemu omusaiza nago enyumaku eedi eyacaaliire oYesu obwire.
Era oNikodemu yaabire nʼekiro ooti 33 egya kalifuwa ogubeeta omiira omutabulemu ekigaji.
Awo ni batwala omulambo gwa Yesu nga bagusiigire okalifuwa, ni bagulingira omu ngoye egitukula empyaka egyʼebbeeyi! Eyo yabbaire niiyo empisa yʼaBayudaaya eyʼokuliika abafu.
Omu kifo oYesu egibamukomereire oku musalabba, wabbairewo omusiri omwabbaire amagombe agʼempuku amayaaka, agebabbaire tibateekangakuumu mulambo.
Era olwakubba wabbaire kumpi, oomwo niimwo omu bateekere omulambo gwa Yesu. Ekyo kityo olwakubba lwabbaire lunaku lwʼaBayudaaya kwetegekaraku ngʼeizo lwabba Saabbaato.
Awo oku lunaku olwesaabbiiti
oMalyamu oMangadaleena nʼawuuna makeezi pwi omu kandikiirya oku magombe agʼempuku aga Yesu. Cooka yaajiirye eibbaale eryabbaire omu mulyango nga balitoirewo.
Nʼolwekyo nʼairuka egiri oSimooni Peetero, nʼomwegi odi ogondi oYesu oguyatakanga eino, nʼabakoba ati, “OMusengwa bamutoiremu omu magombe, era titumaite nʼegibamuteekere!”
Awo oPeetero nʼomwegi odi nago ni basimbuka ni baaba oku magombe.
Bonabona baabire nga bairukira aamo, neye omwegi oodi nago nʼakiraku oPeetero okwiruka, nʼamusooka oku magombe.
Cooka tiyaingiiremu wazira yakomere mu mulyango era nʼakotama okulolamu, nʼabona ngoye njereere nga bagiteekere awo.
Awo oSimooni Peetero eyabbaire amusenjaaku yena nʼatuuka neye iye nʼaingiramu, era yena nʼabona omu magombe ngoye nga bagiteekere awo.
Era yaboine nʼekiwero ekibabbaire basibiire oYesu oku mutwe okubwika omumaiso. Ikyo kyabbaire bakiringire kusani nga kiri ku mbale kyonkani.
Oku nkomerero omwegi odi nago eyabbaire nʼoPeetero era eyeekeereire okutuuka oku magombe, yena nʼaingira nʼabona, era nʼaikirirya.
Neye era babbaire bakaali okutegeera eKiwandiike ekiti, oYesu yabbaire ateekwa okuzuukira.
Awo abeegi abo ni bakanga egibaabbanga.
Neye oMalyamu oMangadaleena yabbaire ayemereire e nza wʼamagombe agʼempuku nago, ngʼakunga. Kale awo oweyabbaire akaali akunga, nʼakotama nʼalola omu magombe,
era nʼabona abamalaika babiri. Babbaire mu bizwalo byeru nga batyaime, omoiza e namutwe, nʼogondi e nabigere omu kifo egibabbaire bateekere omulambo gwa Yesu.
Awo ni bamubuulya bati, “Mukali iwe, okunga niki?” Iye nʼabairamu ati, “OMusengwa wange bamutoiremu, era timmaiteku egibamuteekere!”
Awo oMalyamu oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼagaluka nʼalola e nyuma, nʼabona oYesu ngʼayemereire awo, neye tiyamumanyicirye ati niiye oYesu.

Awo oYesu yena nʼamubuulya ati, “Mukali iwe, okunga niki? Onoonia naani?” Iye oMalyamu olwʼokumusuubiriramu okubba niiye omulabiriri wʼomusiri ogwo, nʼamukoba ati, “Sebo, obanga niiwe omutoiremu, ondagirire egyomuteekere njabe mmutooleyo.”
Awo oYesu nʼamweta ati, “Malyamu!” Awo oMalyamu nʼagaluka okumulolaku, kaisi nʼamukoba omu Lwebbulaniya ati, “Labbooni!” Ekitegeeza kiti, “Musomesya.”

Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Tiwaneevambiryaku olwakubba nkaali okukanga egiri oBbaabba. Wazira oyabe egiri abaganda bange obakobere oti, ‘Nkanga egiri oBbaabba era oItewaanywe, oKibbumba wange era oKibbumba waanywe.’ ”
Era oMalyamu oMangadaleena nʼayaba, nʼakobera abeegi ati, “Mboine oMusengwa!” Era nʼabakobera oMusengwa ebyamukobere.
Awo oku lunaku lwesaabbiiti olwo nago eigolo abeegi babbaire beefungiriirye omu nyumba olwʼokutya aBayudaaya, oYesu nʼaiza, nʼabeemereramu akati, nʼabakoba ati, “Eidembe libbe na inywe!”
Oweyamalire okutumula atyo, nʼabalagisya engalogye nʼebigerebye nʼempetegye. Awo abeegi ni basangaala ino owebaboineku oMusengwa.
Era nʼairamu nʼabakoba ati, “Eidembe libbe na inywe. NgʼoBbaabba oweyantumire, zena mbatuma.”
Oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, nʼabayeereraku omuyeerero, nʼabakoba ati, “Musune oMwoyo oMweru.
Owemwasoniyanga omuntu yenayena ebikole ebibbibibbi ebyakola, oKibbumba yena yaabbanga amusoniyire era singa owemutamusoniyenge, oKibbumba yena yaabbanga tamusoniyire.”
Awo oTomasi omoiza oku beegi eikumi na babiri, ogubeeta oDidimo,
tiyabbaire nʼabainaye oYesu oweyabeeragisiirye.
Kale abeegi abainaye ni bamukobera bati, “Tuboine oMusengwa.”
Neye iye nʼabakoba ati, “Okutoolaku nga mboineku enkozu egyʼemisumaali omu ngalogye, era ni nkubbya olunwe lwange omu nkozu nago, era ni nkwata nʼomu mpetegye, tinakiikirirye.”

Awo owewabitirewo enaku munaana, abeegi ba Yesu tete babbaire bali omu nyumba, leero nga bali nʼoTomasi. Waire nga babbaire beefungiriirye oomwo, oYesu nʼaingira nʼababbaamu nga ayemereire, kaisi nʼabakoba ati, “Eidembe libbe na inywe.”
Awo nʼakoba iye oTomasi ati, “Okubbye aanu olunwe, era obone engalo gyange. Era oleete engaloyo onkwate omu mpete. Aale atyanu olekeraawo okubuusabuusa, wazira oikirirye.”
Awo oTomasi nʼamwiramu ati, “Niiwe oMusengwa wange, era oKibbumba wange!”
OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Iwe oikiriirye olwakubba omboineku. Ibo nga bʼenkabi abatambonangaku neye ni baikirirya!”
OYesu yakolere obumanyiciryo bwʼebyewunyo obundi bungi ngʼabeegibe babona obutali buwandiike omu kitabo kinu.

Neye obwo babuwandiikire kaisi mwezye okwikirirya muti oYesu niiye oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta. Era muti niiye oMwana wa Kibbumba, era olwʼokwikirirya mutyo, kaisi mwezye okusuna obwomi obutawaawo.
Ebyo owebyawoire, oluzwanyuma lwʼenaku ntono oYesu nʼabonekera tete abeegibe oku nyanza oTibberiyo.
Ikyo kyabbairewo kiti:
OSimooni Peetero, nʼoTomasi ogubeeta oMulongo, nʼoNasanairi owʼe Kaana ekyʼe Galiraaya, nʼabataane ba Zebedaayo, nʼabeegi ba Yesu abandi babiri, bonabona abo babbaire aamo.

Awo oSimooni Peetero nʼabakoba ati, “Nze njaba kuvuba.” Ibo ni bamukoba bati, “Swena oleke twabe na iwe.” Era awo ni baaba, ni baniina omu lyato. Cooka ekiire ekyo kyonakyona ni batakwatisyaku ekintu.
Neye amakeezi nga buca, oYesu nʼabonekera oku mbale kwʼenyanza ngʼayemereire, Cooka abeegibe ni batamumanyica bati niiye.
Awo oYesu nʼabeeterera ati, “Bainange, mupapairyekuuyo?” Ni bamwiramu bati, “Bbe.”

Iye nʼabakoba ati, “Aale mutege akatimba kaanywe oku lubba lwʼengalo endiiro lwʼeryato era mwapapalyawo.” Owebategere ni bateezya okukakuusira omu lyato olwʼobuzito bwʼenyanyi empitiriri egibabbaire bapapairye.

Awo omwegi oodi oYesu oguyatakanga eino, nʼakoba oPeetero ati, “Oyo Musengwa!” Amangu ago oSimooni Peetero oweyawuliire ngʼoodi akoba ati, “Oyo Musengwa,” nʼazwala ekizibaawokye, olwakubba yabbaire akitoiremu, kaisi nʼagwa omu maizi.
Abeegi badi abandi ni bamusenjaaku nga ibo bali omu lyato, neenu webakuusa akatimba akaizwire enyanyi. Ekyo kyabbaire kityo olwakubba tibabbaire yala nʼokulukalu, ngʼeibbanga lyʼemita ooti 90.
Awo owebatuukire oku lukalu, ni babona omusyo nga baguteekereku enyanyi, era nʼekyokulya nga kiri awo.
Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Muleeteku enyanyi egimwankazwa okupapalya.”
OSimooni Peetero nʼaniina omu lyato kaisi nʼakulukuusa akatimba, nʼakasomoca oku lukalu. Kabbaire kaizwire aganyanyi aganene 153. Newankubbaire nga gabbaire gangi ino gatyo, akatimba tikatiikire.
Awo oYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Mwize okulya ekyʼamakeezi.” Cooka oku beegibe, mpaawo eyagumire okumubuulya ati, “Niiwe onaani?” Ibo babbaire bamaite bati niiye oMusengwa.
Kale oYesu nʼayaba nʼatoola ekyokulya nʼabawa era nʼatoola nʼenyanyi gyona nʼagibawa.
Ogwo atyanu gwabbaire mulundi gwokusatu oYesu okubonekera abeegibe oluzwanyuma lwʼokumuzuukiza.
Awo owebamalire okulya, oYesu nʼabuulya oSimooni Peetero ati, “Simooni omwana wa Yokaana, ontaka ino okukiraku abainawo?”
Iye nʼamwiramu ati, “Niikyo ekyo Musengwa, era iwe omaite oti nkutaka.”
Awo oYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Aale olisyenge entaama gyange.”
Era tete nʼamubuulya omulundi ogwokubiri ati, “Simooni omwana wa Yokaana, ontaka?”
Iye nʼamwiramu ati, “Niikyo ekyo Musengwa, omaite oti nkutaka.” OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Olisyenge entaama gyange.”
Tete nʼamubuulya omulundi ogwokusatu ati, “Simooni omwana wa Yokaana, ontaka?”
Ekyo ni kimuluma olwakubba oYesu yamubwirye omulundi ogwokusatu ati, “Ontaka?” Iye nʼamwiramu ati, “Musengwa, iwe mpaawo ekyotamaite. Omaite oti nkutaka.”
OYesu nʼamukoba ati, “Olisyenge entaama gyange.
Nkukobera amazima nti owewabbaire ngʼoli munyeete, wazwalanga nʼoyaba egyotaka. Neye atyanu owookulire, waliteekawo engalogyo, ni bakuzwalisya kaisi ni bakutwala egyotataka.”
Ekyo oYesu yakitumwire, ngʼalaga enfa oPeetero egiyalifaamu okugulumalya oKibbumba. Era awo, nʼakoba oPeetero ati, “Weegumye okubba musengereri wange.”

Awo oPeetero nʼagaluka okulola e nyuma, nʼabona omwegi oodi oYesu oguyatakanga, ngʼabasengererya. Omwegi oyo nago, niiye oodi eyeigikireku oku Yesu omu kifubba katono nga balya, kaisi nʼamubuulya ati, “Musengwa, naani eyakulyamu olukwe?”
Awo oPeetero oweyamuboine, nʼabuulya oYesu ati, “Musengwa, onu iye yalibba atya?”
OYesu nʼamwiramu ati, “Singa owentaka nti asigale mwomi paka owenaliira, ekyo kikukwataku? Iwe weegumye kubba musengereri wange.”

Olwʼekibono ekyo okalebule nʼasaalaana omu boluganda ati omwegi oPeetero ogubabbaire batumulaku nago, tiyalifa. Neye oYesu iye tiyakobere ati omwegi nago tiyalifa, wazira ekiyakobere kyabbaire kiti, “Singa owentaka nti asigale mwomi paka owenaliira, ekyo kikukwataku?”
Oyo nago niiye omwegi akakasa ebintu ebyo, era niiye eyabiwandiikire. Kale tumaite tuti ebiyawandiikire ebyo bituuce.
OYesu yakolere ebintu ebindi bingi. Era singa buli kimo bakiwandiikire, nseega nti waire kyalo kyonakyona tikyandituukiremu ebitabo ebibandibbaire bawandiikire.
Acts: Sebo Teefiiro, omu kitabo kyange ekisooka, nʼawandiikire ku biibyo oYesu ebiyakolere nʼebiyayegeserye okuzwera nakimo oweyatandiikiire okukola omulimogwe,
paka oku lunaku oKibbumba oluyamutwaliireku omwigulu. Okumutwala omwigulu okwo kwabbairewo ngʼamalire okuwa abatumebe abo abeyabbaire alonderemu ebiragiro, ngʼoMwoyo oMweru oweyamulungamirye.

Oluzwanyuma lwʼokugadakwe nʼokufa, yazuukiire era ni yeeragisiya eeri abatumebe abo nago emirundi mingi, nʼabawa nʼebiraga ebyera ebyabakakasiire nakimo biti yazuukiire. Okumala enaku 40, yababonekeranga era nʼatumulanga nabo oku bikwata oku bwakabaka bwa Kibbumba.

Lumo, owebabbaire aamo naye oku kiinulo, nʼabasisiitira ati, “Timwaluuya okuzwa aanu omu Yerusaalemi, wazira mubbe nga mukuumirira ekirabo kidi ekinabakobeireku ekyʼoMwoyo oMweru oBbaabba ekiyasuubizire okubawa.
OYokaana yabatizire abantu na maizi,
neye inywe, omu naku egitali gyʼe yala, baaba okubabatiza na Mwoyo oMweru.”
Olundi, abatume owebakumbaine aamo nʼoYesu, ni bamubuulya bati, “Musengwa, oolwo atyanu omu kiseera kinu oyaba okutoolawo obufugi bwa Balooma era ofuge?”
OYesu nʼabakoba ati, “Tikibeetaagisya inywe okumanya ebiseera nʼenaku oBbaabba iye, omu bwezyebwe, ebiyasalirewo.

Wazira, ekimubba mumanye niikyo kinu muti oMwoyo oMweru oweyalibaikaku, yalibawa amaani. Era, mwalimmanyikisya eeri abʼomu kibuga ekyʼe Yerusaalemi, nʼabʼomwitwale lyʼe Buyudaaya mwonamwona, nʼabʼomwitwale lyʼe Samaaliya paka owemwaliwoisya ebyalo byonabyona.”
Oweyamalire okutumula ebyo, oKibbumba nʼamutwala omwigulu nga nʼabatume balingiriire, ekireri ni kimubbuuna ni kibalobeesererya okumubona tete.
Nga bakaali bali aawo bakaliirye amaiso omwibbanga, nga iye ayaba, abasaiza babiri abazwaire ebizwalo ebyeru ni babbutukira anyere aawo, nga beemereire okumpi nabo.

Abasaiza abo ni babuulya abatume bati, “Inywe abasaiza abʼe Galiraaya, lwaki mukaali mwemereire aanu mulangaasiire omwibbanga? OYesu oyo ogubabatoireku ni bamutwala omwigulu niiye onyere oyo eyaliira, era yaliira mu ngeri enanyere eyo.”
Abasaiza ababiri abo owebazwirewo, abatume ni bairayo omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi nga bazwa oku Lusozi olubeeta olwʼeMisaale eMizaituuni, akagendo akeerya ooti kiromita moiza
yonkani okuzwa e Yerusaalemi.

Owebaingiire omu kibuga, ni baaba omu nyumba, ni baniina omu kisenge ekyʼe ngulu omu baabbanga. Mwabo ababbairewo mwabbairemu banu: OPeetero, nʼoYokaana, nʼoYaakobbo, nʼAndereya, nʼoFiripo, nʼoTomasi, nʼoBbantulumaayo, nʼoMatayo, nʼoYaakobbo ogondi omutaane wʼAlufaayo, nʼoSimooni oMulwaniriri wa kwefuga kwʼeigwangalye, nʼoYuda omutaane wa musaiza ogondi ogubeeta oYaakobbo.
Abo bonabona, nga bali aamo nʼoMalyamu omaaye wa Yesu nʼabakali abandi, era nʼabaganda ba Yesu, nga bali omu bumo, ni banyikiiranga okusaba oKibbumba.
Lumo, abaikirirya ababbaire beera ooti 120 nga bakumbaine, oPeetero nʼayemerera akati mwibo, nʼabakoba ati,

“Boluganda, ekibono okabaka oDawudi ekiyatumwire omu Biwandiike ekikwata oku Yuda kyabbaire nʼokutuukirira. OMwoyo oMweru, e nyumaku eedi, ngʼabitira omu Dawudi, yalagwire ekyalibbaawo oku Yuda. OYuda niiye eyalagiriire era ni yeekubbemberamu abo abakwaite oYesu,
newankubbaire ngʼoYesu yabbaire amulondere ngʼomutume aamo na iswe, era ni tuweereryaku aamo naye ngʼomunaiswe omu mulimo gunu.”

Omu mpiiya egibawaire oYuda olwʼekikolekye ekibbikibbi, yagiguliremu kigona. Ekigona ekyo niimwo omu yeemyedeire nʼafa, omulambogwe ni gwepotolerawo nga gugwera mutwe, ni gwatikamu ekida akati, ebyenda ni bisusuka.
Newankubbaire nga bakigulire mu kyama neye abatyami bʼomu Yerusaalemi bonabona ekyo bakitegeire, kagira omu lutumu lwabwe, ekigona ekyo bakiwaire eriina bati Akerudama.
OPeetero ni yeeyongera ati, “Ekyo kyabbaire nʼokubbaawo olwakubba bakiwandiikire omu kitabo kyʼeZabbuli bati:
‘Ekisitokye kisuuke kinameje,
tiwaabbaawo muntu akityamamu.’
“Era bati,
‘Omuntu ogondi atwale ekifookye ekyʼobwekubbemberi omu mulimo.’

“Nʼolwekyo, kyetaagisya tulondemu omusaiza moiza atweyungeku omu mulimo gwʼokukakasa abantu tuti oMusengwa waiswe oYesu yazuukiire. Omusaiza oyo aali nʼokubba nga moiza oku basaiza ababbaire na iswe ekiseera kyonakyona oMusengwa waiswe oYesu ekiyamalire na iswe, ekikoba kiti, ngʼabbaire na iswe nga tutandiika okuzwera nakimo ebiseera oYokaana omu yabatiziranga, okutuukira nakimo owebatutooleireku oYesu ni bamutwala omwigulu.”

“Nʼolwekyo, kyetaagisya tulondemu omusaiza moiza atweyungeku omu mulimo gwʼokukakasa abantu tuti oMusengwa waiswe oYesu yazuukiire. Omusaiza oyo aali nʼokubba nga moiza oku basaiza ababbaire na iswe ekiseera kyonakyona oMusengwa waiswe oYesu ekiyamalire na iswe, ekikoba kiti, ngʼabbaire na iswe nga tutandiika okuzwera nakimo ebiseera oYokaana omu yabatiziranga, okutuukira nakimo owebatutooleireku oYesu ni bamutwala omwigulu.”
Awo omu baikirirya ni muzwamu abaleetere amaliina gʼabasaiza babiri. Erya Yusufu oBbalusabba abamo ogubabbaire bamaite ngʼoYusito, nʼerya gondi bati Matiya.

Bonabona owebamalire okugabitya, ni baingira omu kusaba. Omoiza oku batume ni yeekubbembera, nʼasaba ati, “Musengwa waiswe, niiwe omaite abantu bonabona ngʼowebafaanana omu myoyo gyabwe. Kale tukusaba, oku babiri banu, otulagisye ogwolondereku,
tumuwe ekifo omu mulimo gwʼobutume, oYuda ekiyalekere nʼayaba egyasaaniire okubba.”
Okusaba owekwawoire, ekyaiririire Kibbumba kubalagisya ati Matiya niiye ogwalondere, atyo ni yeeyunga okwikumi na moiza, tete ni babba abatume ikumi na babiri.
Awo olunaku olwa Pentekonte ni lutuuka. Kwolwo, abaikirirya bonabona babbaire bakumbaaniire mu nyumba moiza, omu Yerusaalemi.

Babbaire ooti bali awo, ni bawulira okululuma okwʼamaani okuli ooti gumpunga ogwʼamaani nga kuzwa omwigulu. Okululuma okwo ni kumalaku enyumba omu babbaire batyaime mwonamwona, buli moiza nʼakuwulira.
Babba ooti bakaali bali awo, ni babona ebintu ebiri ooti ndimi gya musyo egigawukaine okusuukamu lumolumo, era buli lumo kwigyo ni lugwa oku buli moiza kwibo.
Abaikirirya bonabona ni baizula oMwoyo oMweru, batyo ni batandiika nʼokutumula omu ntumu egindi egibatayegangaku, buli moiza ngʼoMwoyo oMweru oweyamwezyesyanga okugitumula.
Omu kiseera ekyo, omu Yerusaalemi mwabbairemu abasaiza aBayudaaya ababbaire batya oKibbumba, ababbaire baizire okuzwa kumpi ooti mu buli kitundu ekiri oku kyalo.

Abasaiza abo owebawuliire olukero, ni beekumbaania mu bungi egiri abaikirirya okubona niki ekyaba omu maiso. Neye buli moiza kwibo kyamwewunyisirye okuwulira abaikirirya nga batumula omu ntumu gyabwe ibo aBayudaaya abageni.
Awo abasaiza abo ni bawuninkirira ino era ni beebuulyangana bati, “Ii, abantu banu bonabona abatumula, kaisi tibatyami bʼomwitwale lyʼe Galiraaya?
Kaisi tete kiiza kitya okubba kiti iswe swenaswena otuli aanu tubuliramu abatumula omu ntumu gyʼeedi egituzwera?

Iswe ngʼowetuli aanu, newankubbaire nga tuli Bayudaaya, tuzwera mu byalo byʼenjabulo. Abamo kwiswe tuzwera mu Palutiya, nʼe Mediya, nʼEramu; mu Mesopotaamiya, Buyudaaya, nʼe Kapadookiya; mu Ponto, nʼAsiya.
Era, tulimu nʼabazwera omu Furigiya, nʼe Panfiriya, nʼe Misiri, nʼebitundu ebyʼe Liibbiya okulirana ekibuga Kuleene. Kaisi era, mwiswe mulimu nʼabageni-obugeni okuzwa Looma

nga tutwaliiremu aBayudaaya nʼabamawanga agandi abacuukire okwaba omu diini yʼeKiyudaaya. Kaisi tete, ni wabbaawo abali mwiswe abazwera mu Kuleete, nʼomu Buwalabbu. Neye aale obone swenaswena owetubawulira nga batumulira mu ntumu egyʼe waiswe ebyʼamaani oKibbumba ebyakolere!”
Olwakubba bonabona babbaire bawungire era nga bibasobeire, abamo kwibo ni beefudangaku kwebuulyangana bati, “Kinu kyezya okubba kitegeeza niki?”
Neye abandi kwibo ni babeesekeranga-bwesekeri na kujerega baikirirya nga webakoba bati, “Banu leero bateemeire mwenge omuyo!”

Neye oPeetero ngʼali aawo nʼabatume abandi eikumi na moiza, nʼasetuka nʼayemerera omu maiso gʼabantu kaisi nʼairamu ebibabbaire bakoba. Nʼamagono agʼangulu era nʼobukanu obunene nʼatandiika okutumula egibali ati, “Bayudaaya bainange, era na inywe nywenanywena abali omu Yerusaalemi, muwulisisye kusani, nga mbasonzolera ekintu ekiri aanu.
Abantu banu abemubona tibateemeire nga inywe owemuseega, olwakubba nginu giri saawa isatu-busatu egyʼamakeezi.
Ekituuce kiri kiti, ekitutuukireku niikyo ekyo onaabbi oYoweri ekiyatumwireku oweyakobere ati:
‘OKibbumba atyo waakoba ati omu naku egyʼoluzwanyuma,
naligira oMwoyo wange nʼaika omu maani amabitiriri oku bantu aba buli ngeri.
Era okubitira mwiye, naliragulisya abataane baanywe nʼabaala baanywe ebyaiza omu maiso.
Abanyeete mwinywe balisuna okwolesebwa okuzwa egyendi,
nʼabasaiza abakulu mwinywe ni mbalootesya ebirooto.
Era, nʼoku bagalama bange, abakali nʼabasaiza abampeererya,
bona omu naku egyo
oMwoyo wange yalibaikaku, nʼabeezyesya okutumula
obukwenda obuzwa egyendi.
Naligira ebintu ebyewunyisya ni bibbaawo angulu omwibbanga,
ni nkola nʼebyewunyisya oku kyalo birage amaani gange,
walibbaawo okusuka eisaaye, nʼomusyo, nʼomwosi omudiiki gwaliduunya.
Naligira eisana ni lirikira,
nʼomweri ni gutukulika ni gufaanana ooti isaaye.
Ebyo byalisooka ni bibbaawo kaisi olunaku lwa Musengwa olukulu
era olwʼekitiisya olwʼokusaliraku abantu omusango ni lutuuka.
Neye olunaku oolwo nga lukaali kutuuka,
buli moiza eyalikungirira oMusengwa okumubbeera balimulokola.’ ”

OPeetero niiye okweyongera ati, “Aale Baisirairi bainange muwulisisye ebibono ebinjaba okutumula. OYesu owʼe Naazaleesi yabbaire musaiza oKibbumba onyere oguyakakasire ati niiye onyere amutumire. Ekyo yakikolere mu kumwezyesya okukola ebyamagero, nʼebyewunyo, nʼobumanyiciryo oKibbumba ebiyamukolesyanga oweyabbaire mwinywe, era nywena abananyere mukimaite nakusani.

Neye newankubbaire ngʼekyo mwabbaire mukimaite nakusani, omusaiza oyo bamuwaireyo egimuli, nywena ni mumukwatisya abakola ebibbibibbi okumukomerera oku musalabba, mutyo ni mumwita, era ngʼoKibbumba onyere oweyabbaire amalire okukitegeka, era ngʼakimaitiirewo.

OYesu yabitire omu bulumi bubitiriri kaisi nafa. Neye oKibbumba nʼamuzuukiza, atyo nʼamuteeresya okuzwa omu bulumi okufa obukuleeta olwakubba amagombe gabbaire tigeezya okumukalangulirayo okusigala nga mufu.
Tukakasa obutuuce bwʼekyo olwakubba, eira nakimo, ebyo niibyo oKurisito ebiyatumulisirye okabaka oDawudi oweyakobere ati:
‘Mbona oMusengwa oKibbumba ngʼaneekubbembeire buliijo;
olwakubba ali na nze okumbeera
kaisi tiwaabbaawo ekintukutya omwoyo.
Kagira omwoyo gwange gwizwire eisangaalo, ntyo ni nkuwuuja;
neenu ndi mugumu nti, waire nzwaire mubiri-biiri ogufa ni guvunda,
owenalifa waligwiryawo ni gubba mwomi tete.
Ekyo kityo olwakubba, tiwalireka omwoyo gwange omu Kiina eKitakoma,
waire okuganya omubiri gwʼoMweruwo okuvunda.
Ondagire amanzira agendi nʼokukwata kaisi ntuuke omu bwomi.
Olwakubba oli na nze, wanjizulya eisangaalo.’ ”

OPeetero ni yeeyongera nʼakoba ati, “Boluganda, oleke mbakobere kinu anambula kutya nti, ozeiza waiswe okabaka oDawudi yafiire, ni bamuliika omu magombe, era nʼatyanu-bunu amagombege gakaali gali okwaiswe kunu.

Nʼolwekyo, ekintu kyeraga kyonkani kiti oDawudi tiyabbaire yeetumulaku nanyere, neye olwakubba yabbaire naabbi, era ngʼamaite kusani oKibbumba ekiyamusuubizire ngʼalayira ati, ‘Omoiza oku baizukulu ba Dawudi yalisikira entebe eyʼobwakabakabwe.’
Olwakubba yamaite ebiiza okubbaawo omu maiso, kagira yalagwire oku kuzuukira kwa Kurisito ogubasukireku amafuta, ngʼakoba ati, ‘Tibamulekeswire omu bafu, waire okuganya omubirigwe okuvunda.’
OYesu oyo oKibbumba yamuzuukizire, era swenaswena abaikiriryabe, tweboneireku nʼagaiswe era tukikakasa eeri buli muntu.
Era oKibbumba yamalire okumuniinisya omwigulu, nʼamutyamisya aamo naye omu kifo ekyʼekitiisya eino,
nʼamukwatisya nʼoMwoyo oMweru, era nga iye oIteeye oweyabbaire amusuubizire. OYesu yena niiye okutwicaaku oMwoyo oMweru oyo, era oMwoyo niiye aleeterewo ebyo ebimubona nʼebimuwulira.
Dala okabaka oDawudi tiyabbaire yeetumulaku niiye onyere, olwakubba iye tibamuniinisirye omwigulu ngʼowekyabbaire oku Yesu. Tete era onyere yatumwire biinu oku Yesu ati,
‘OMusengwa oKibbumba yakobere oMusengwa wange ati:
Otyame na nze omu kifo ekyʼekitiisya ino
paka owenaligondya abalabebo
ni mbasuuca mukonkolo ogwa kuwuumuliryaku ebigerebyo.’ ”

Ngʼamaliirirya, oPeetero nʼakoba ati, “Nʼolwekyo, abantu bʼe Isirairi nywenanywena mukimanye anambula kubuusabuusa muti, oYesu oyo ogumwakomereire oku musalabba niiye oKibbumba oguyasuucirye okubba oMusengwa era oKurisito ogubasukireku amafuta.”

Abantu ababbaire bawulisisya oPeetero owebawuliire ebyo ebiyatumwire, ni bibalumirirya, ni bawulira oku myoyo gyabwe ngʼomusango gubakwata, niiye okubuulya oPeetero nʼabatume abainaye bati, “Baganda baiswe, oolwo atyanu twakola tutya kaisi oKibbumba ayezye okutusoniya?”

OPeetero nʼabairamu ati, “Mwenenye ebikole ebibbibibbi, era buli moiza bamubatize omu liina lya Yesu oKurisito. Awo oKibbumba yabasoniya omusango gwʼebibbibibbi byanywe, era nʼabawa nʼekirabokye, nga niikyo oMwoyo oMweru,
olwakubba ikyo oKibbumba yakibasuubizire niinywe, nʼabaana baanywe, era nʼabo bonabona abali e yala, bonabona abo oMusengwa waiswe oKibbumba abeyalyeta.”
Nʼebibono ebindi bingi, oPeetero ni yeeyongera okubalaabbira, ngʼabasisiitira ati, “Muganye oKibbumba abalokole muwunuke ekibonerezo ekyayaba okuwa abantu ababbibabbi abʼomulembe gunu ogwalemaire.”
Nʼolwebyo, abaikiriirye ebibono oPeetero ebiyakobere bababatizire, era oku lunaku oolwo, abaikirirya abayaaka abeera ooti 3,000 ni babeegaitaku.

Abaikirirya bonabona ni banyiikiriranga okusuna okubeegesya okuzwa eeri abatume nʼokukwata ebibabeegeserye, nʼokubba nʼomwoyo ogwʼobumo, ekikoba kiti, buli moiza ngʼalumirwa omwinaye, nʼokugabana oku kiinulo ekimo, okwo ngʼoteekereku nʼokusaba.
OKibbumba nʼayezyesya abatume okukola ebyewunyo bingi ino, era abʼe Yerusaalemi bonabona ni baizula okuwuninkirira.
Bonabona abaikiriirye oYesu baabbanga bumo, nga bakumbaanira aamo buliijo, era nga buli moiza wʼeidembe okukolesya ekintu omwinaye ekiyabbaire nakyo.
Ekikoba kiti, olwisi abamo kwibo batundanga nʼebyabwe, empiiya egibatoolangamu ni bagigabira yenayena mwibo okusinzirira oku kyetaagokye.

Tibagoneryanga okukumbaanira aamo omu luuga lwʼeYeekaalu buli lunaku, oteekeku nʼokucaalanganiranga kisito ku kisito ni bagabanira aamo ebiinulo nʼemyoyo egiizwire eisangaalo nʼeiwooyo anambula kwekolesya,
era nga webawuuja oKibbumba, era nga nʼabantu bonabona babasiima. Ebyo nga byaba omu maiso, buli lunaku oMusengwa nʼabongerangaku abantu abandi, abo abalokokanga.
Lumo, oPeetero nʼoYokaana ni baniinaniina okwaba omu Yeekaalu oku saawa omwenda egyʼeigolo, esaawa abantu omu bakumbaaniranga okusaba oKibbumba.

Owebabbaire batuuka oku luuga lwʼeYeekaalu wabbairewo omusaiza ogubabyaire nga munialuuki ogubabbaire batuuca oku geeti. Buli lunaku bamuteekanga awo oku geeti egibeeta eNsa, asabirirye abantu abaingira.
Oweyaboine oPeetero nʼoYokaana nga baiza batira okwingira, nʼabasaba empiiya.
Awo bona ni bamwekalikica, era oPeetero nʼamukoba ati, “Kaade otulingirire!”
Atyo yena nʼabakaliryaku amaiso, ngʼasuubira ati babbaaku nʼakantu akebamuwa.
Awo oPeetero nʼamukoba ati, “Empiiya ngibula, wazira ekindinakyo kinakuwa. Omu liina lya Yesu oKurisito owʼe Naazaleesi, nkulagira nti, otambule.”
Awo oPeetero nʼamukwata oku ngalo endiiro, nʼamubbeeraku okumusetuca. Amangu ago, ebigere bya musaiza oyo nʼobubbongebwe ni bicaata.
Omusaiza nʼayalamuka nʼayemerera, era nʼatandiika nʼokutambula. Era nʼaingira nabo oku luuga lwʼeYeekaalu ngʼatambula era ngʼajuukajuuka ngʼawuuja oKibbumba.
Abantu bonabona ababbaire awo owebaboine ngʼatambula awuuja oKibbumba

baabire okumwetegereza nga dala niiye oyo eyatyamanga oku geeti yʼoluuga lwʼeYeekaalu egibeeta bati Nsa ngʼasabirirya. Bonabona ni beewunya ino, era ni bawugulala olwʼekyo ekyabbaire kituukire oku musaiza oyo.

Awo omusaiza eyabbaire omunialuuki ngʼakaali ali nʼoPeetero nʼoYokaana abeesibireku olwʼekibabbaire bamukoleire, abantu bonabona ababbairewo, ni beewunya era ni bairuka okwiza egiri oPeetero nʼoYokaana omu kigango ekibakaliryeku eriina bati Pooci ya kabaka oSulemaani.

OPeetero oweyaboine abantu beekumbaanirye, nʼabakoba ati, “Baisirairi bainange, ekyo lwaki dala kibeewunyisya? Ekigira mutumaliraku amaiso mutyo niki ooti-so amo bwezye bwaiswe, ooba butuukirirye bwaiswe omu maiso ga Kibbumba niibyo ebyezeserye omusaiza onu okutambula?
OKibbumba wa Ibbulaimu, era wa Isaka, era wa Yaakobbo, abazeiza baiswe abo ogubasinzanga, niiye agulumairye oMuweereryawe
oYesu, inywe ogumwawaireyo bamwite, era ni mumwegaanira omu maiso ga Piraato, waire nga iye yabbaire asalirewo okumuteera.
Obone dala ni mwegaana oyo Atuukiriire era oMweru wa Kibbumba, kaisi omu kifookye ni musaba babateerere omutemo.
Dala ni mwita oyo onsulo wʼobwomi obutawaawo, neye oKibbumba nʼamuzuukiza. Era iswe swenaswena ekyo ekitukoba twakyeboneireku nʼagaiswe.

Olwʼokwesiga oYesu oyo nʼobwezyebwe, kagira omuntu onu ogumubona aanu era ogumumaite nakusani airiremu amaani. Ekikoba kiti, kwikirirya okutuli nakwo omu liina lya Yesu niikwo okugirisirye nʼalamirya nakimo omusaiza onu, era nywenanywena ngʼowemwebonesya.
“Aale atyanu baganda bange, nkimaite nga inywe, aamo nʼabeekubbemberi baanywe, ebimwakolere oYesu, mwabikolere mu butamanya.

Neye obone, mwibyo niimwo oKibbumba omuyabitiire okutuukirirya ebyo ebiyabbaire alangiriire e nyuma nakimo eedi, ngʼabitira omu banaabbi bonabona, ati oKurisito oyo oguyalondere okununula abantu yalibita omu kugada era ni bamwita.
Nʼolwekyo mwenenye, mugaluke mwire eeri oKibbumba asoniye ebibbibibbi byanywe, kaisi emyoyo gyanywe gisunenge okwira obuyaaka okuzwa eeri oMusengwa oKibbumba.
Era aweererye tete oKurisito oyo oguyamalire okubalondera, era ngʼoyo niiye oYesu.
OKurisito oyo aali nʼokubba ngʼasigala omwigulu paka ekiseera oKibbumba oweyaliiriryawo obuyaaka buli kintu nga kituukiriire, era ngʼoweyasuubizire eira eino ngʼabitira omu banaabbibe abeeru.

Ngʼekyokuboneraku, onaabbi Musa yakobere ati, ‘OMusengwa waanywe oKibbumba yalibasetulira onaabbi okuzwa omu bantu bʼeigwanga lyanywe eyalifaanana ooti ninze. Muteganga amatwi eeri byonabyona ebyo ebiyalibakoba.
Oyo yenayena atawulisisya onaabbi oyo, oKibbumba yalimutooleramu kimo nantabba omuntu owuwe, era nʼamujigirica.’
“Era abanaabbi abandi bonabona, nga mwotwaliirye nʼoSamwiri nʼabo abamwiririireku, abo bonabona ababbaireku nʼekibono okuzwa eeri oKibbumba ekibatumwire, ebiriwo omu naku ginu babirangiriire.

Ebyo oKibbumba ebiyasuubizire ngʼabitira omu banaabbi, byanywe era nʼendagaano egiyalaagaine nʼabazeiza baanywe, bagikolere kugasa niinywe. Yakobere oIbbulaimu ati, ‘Naliwa amawanga gonagona enkabi nga mbita mu baizukulubo.’
Kagira obona oti oKibbumba oweyamalire okulonda omuweereryawe oYesu, yasookere kumusindika eeri niinywe abagase kinene ngʼabagaluca nywenanywena abatoole omu kwabira oku bikole byanywe ebibbibibbi.”
OPeetero nʼoYokaana nga bakaali batumula eeri abantu, abakabona nʼakulira abakuumi bʼeYeekaalu, aamo nʼabʼekibbula kyʼaBasedukaayo ababbaire awo, ni baigerera egibali.
Babbaire banyiigi ino olwakubba abatume babbaire beegesya abantu oku Yesu ngʼoweyazuukiire, ekyo nga kiragisya era ni kikakasa kiti abafu bʼokuzuukira, ekintu ekyakanisya enjegesya yʼeKisedukaayo.
Nʼolwekyo, ni bagwera oPeetero nʼoYokaana, ni babakwata, neye olwakubba ebiseera byabbaire byʼeigolo ngʼobwire bubitire, ni babadyaka mu mabbuusu paka eizo.
Neye era, bangi kwabo ababbaire awo abawuliire ebibono oPeetero ebiyalaabbiire abaikiririirye omu Yesu, era kwolwo obungi bwʼabaikirirya ni bweyongera paka ooti 5,000, nga tobaliireku abakali.
Oku lunaku olwairireku, abafugi bʼaBayudaaya nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga, nʼabakugu omu byʼaMateeka ga Musa, ni bakumbaanira omu kibuga e Yerusaalemi.

Omu bikonge ebyabbairewo niimwo omwabbaire Anasi okabona akira obukulu eyawuumwire, nʼoKayaafa eyabbaire okabona akira obukulu eyabbaireku ebiseera ebyo, nʼabakabona abandi babiri, oYokaana nʼErigizanda, nʼabasaiza abandi abʼomu lulyo lwa kabona akira obukulu.

Ni beetesya oPeetero nʼoYokaana, ni babeemererya omu maiso gʼakakiiko akakulu akʼabanadiini, ni batandiika okubabuulya ebibuulyo bati, “Okwaba okulamya omusaiza oyo, mwamulamiirye mu bwezye bwani? Ooba naani eyabawaire olukusa okukola ekyo?”
Awo oPeetero, ngʼaizwire amaani ga Mwoyo oMweru, nʼabairamu ati, “Basebo bafugi baiswe, era abantu abakulu omwigwanga lyaiswe.
Abba ngʼolwatyanu lunu mutuwozesya lwʼekikole ekisa ekitukolere eeri omuntu abbaire omunialuuki, na kutubuulya ngeri egyalamiremu,

aale inywe nywenanywena nʼabantu bʼomwIsirairi abandi bonabona mukimanye muti bwezye bwa Yesu oKurisito owʼe Naazaleesi, inywe ogumwakomereire oku musalabba neye oKibbumba nʼamuzuukiza, niibwo obulamirye omusaiza onu. Era kagira ayemereire omu maiso gaanywe nga mwomi piri.
OYesu oyo niiye eBiwandiike ogubitumulaku biti:
‘Eibbaale eeryo abombeki eribagaine
lisuukire niiryo erikulu erisiba ensonda yʼomusingi.’
“Era, mpaawo muntu gondi ayezya okulokola abantu okutoolaku oYesu. Ekyo kityo olwakubba mpaawo muntu gondi ansi wʼeisana oKibbumba oguyatusindikiire ateekwa okutulokola.”

AbʼoLukiiko owebaboine oPeetero nʼoYokaana nga bakalu bʼamaiso, era nga bakitegeireku bati bonabona bantu ba buliijo abatali bakugu omu byʼediini, ni kibeewunyisya ino, neye oluzwanyuma ni kibaizira kiti kaisi ababiri abo batambulanga nʼoYesu.
Nʼolwakubba babbaire beeboneraku omusaiza, eyabbaire omu kaseera ako ayemereire awo ampi nʼoPeetero nʼoYokaana, ngʼoweyabbaire alamire, ni bakayaku ekyʼokubavunaana.
Niiwo okulagira abo abebawozesya bawuluke omu Lukiiko. Owebamalire okubawuluca, abʼoLukiiko ni beegeyamu oku Peetero nʼoYokaana, nga webeebuulya bati,
“Twakola tutya okubonereza abantu banu? Ekisooka-obusooki, ekyewunyo ekyʼamaanimaani ekyo ekibakolere kimalire okumanyikana kumpi omu bʼe Yerusaalemi bonabona kale titwezya kukyegaana!

Koizi ekitubba tukole, tulabule basaiza banu kutairayo okutumula na muntu yenayena ooba okwegesya omu liina eeryo, amo ni twezya okulobeesererya ebikwata kwekyo ekibakolere okweyongera okusalaana omu bantu.”
Batyo ni beetesya oPeetero nʼoYokaana, ni babalagira okutairayo okutumula, ooba okwegesya omuntu yenayena omu liina lya Yesu, waire ebimukwataku.
Okubairamu, oPeetero, ngʼali aamo nʼomwinaye oYokaana, nʼabairamu ati, “Inywe nywena abanyere kaabbo mwesalirewo ku binu ekisaaniire okukola omu maiso ga Kibbumba; kugondera niiye ooba niinywe?
Ekyo kityo olwakubba, mpaawo ngeri iswe egitwezya okutatumula kwebyo ebitweboneireku nʼagaiswe ngʼoYesu akola era nʼebyo ebitwawuliire ngʼayegesya.”

Awo oluzwanyuma lwʼokubatiisyatiisya, ni babateera, olwo-so nga bakayire ensonga etegerekeka egibababonerezeraku ni batakayula abantu, olwakubba abantu bonabona ababbaire awo babbaire bali mu kuwuuja Kibbumba olwʼekyo ekyakolere.
Omusaiza oyo nago ogubalamirye omu ngeri eyʼekyewunyo yabbaire wʼemyanka egibita omu 40.
Owebamalire okubateera, oPeetero nʼoYokaana ni bairayo eeri abanaabwe, ni babakobera byonabyona abakabona abakulu, aamo nʼabantu abakulu omwigwanga abandi ebibabakobere.
Owebawuliire ebyo, bonabona omu bumo, ni beegairira oKibbumba nʼebibono binu bati, “Musengwa oKirabyonabyona, iwe eyabbumbire eigulu, nʼekyalo, nʼenyanza, era nabuli kintu ekibirimu.
Ngʼobitira omu Mwoyo oMweru, watumuliire omu zeiza waiswe era omuweereryawo okabaka Dawudi, nʼokoba oti:
‘Lwaki abanamawanga baizwire obunyiigi,
era lwaki abantu basala enkwe eginambulamu?
Abafugi bʼoku kyalo bakolere entegeka,
nʼabeekubbemberi ni bakumbaanira aamo
okulwanisya oMusengwa oKibbumba
nʼokulwanisya oyo oguyasukireku amafuta.’

“Era omu butuuce kityo wekyabbaire; okabaka oKerode nʼoPontiyo Piraato nʼaBatali Bayudaaya, era nʼaBaisirairi beekumbaaniirye omu kibuga kinu ni basala olukwe okulwanisya omuweereryawo omweru, oYesu, oguwasukireku amafuta.
Omu kukola ekyo, ni batuukirirya ekyo iwe ekiwabbaire omalire okutegeka omu bwezyebwo, ngʼowewatakire.
Aale atyanu Musengwa, olingirire omu kutiisyatiisya okubakolere, oyezyesye abaweereryabo okutumula ekibonokyo nʼobugumu anambula kwezizyazizya.
Olage amaanigo olamye abantu, era nʼebyamagero tubikole omu liina lya muweereryawo omweru oYesu.”
Owebamalire okwegairira oKibbumba, ni wabbaawo okutengeeta omu kifo omu babbaire bakumbaaniire. Bonabona ni baizula oMwoyo oMweru, era ni batandiika okutumula ekibono kya Kibbumba nʼobugumu.

Ebiro ebyo, abaikirirya ba Kurisito bonabona babbaire mu bumo era nga bʼenseega moiza. Mpaawo kadi moiza mwibo eyakobanga ati ekintu kirebe ekyali nakyo kikye-kububwe iye yenkani, wazira ngʼakitwala ngʼekyʼokukolesya nʼokugasa nʼabainaye abandi bonabona.
Nʼamaani mangi, abatume ni bakakasa okuzuukira kwa Musengwa waiswe oYesu, era bonabona oKibbumba nʼababbeeranga ino.
Buli moiza kwibo yasunanga ebiyeetaaganga, olwakubba abaabbanga nʼebigona ooba nyumba bagitundangamu, empiiya egyazwangamu
ni bagiwaayo eeri abatume, abatume ni bagigabira buli muntu okusinzirira oku kwetaaga okuyaabbanga nakwo.
Omu ngeri eyo, nʼomusaiza oMuleevi ogubeeta bati Yusufu omutyami wʼe Kupulo, abatume ogubabbaire bakaliryeku erya Bbalunaba, amakulu gaalyo, Airyamu abantu amaani,
nʼatunda ekigonakye, empiiya egyazwiremu nʼagitwala nʼagikwatisya abatume.
Neye lumo, omusaiza omoiza kwibo ogubeeta bati Ananiya, eyabbaire nʼomukali ogubeeta bati Safira, yena nʼatunda ekigona.

Empiiya egyazwiremu nʼatoolaku ekitundu nʼakibisa akyesigalirye, era nga nʼomukaliwe akimaiteku. Egyasigairewo nʼagitwala nʼagikwatisya abatume nga waabbeyesya ati egyaleetere niigyo egyo gyonagyona egiyasuniremu.
Awo niiye oPeetero okumubuulya ati, “Ananiya, lwaki oikiriirye oSitaani okufuga omwoyogwo, nʼobbeya oMwoyo oMweru nga weebisiraku egimo oku mpiiya egiwasunire omu kutunda ekigona?
